Title: Saving Account
Heading: Easy to access and branch experience is good
Review: Every transactions are going smoothly with my Axis bank savings account. They charge for IMPS charges and for NEFT the charges are nil. Its a zero balance account. The axis bank net banking facility is convenient to use. Only to deposit cheque, i used to visit the branch and the response is immediately and the staffs are friendly.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: You can bank on Axis bank any time
Review: I have not provided any documents and straightaway the amount is credited to my account. Its been 22 installments are over and more 20 months to go for completing the loan. It took 2 days to sanctioned the loan. The interest rate is nominal and the processing fee was 1.25%  which is convenient for me.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Easy to access the axis bank
Review: Axis bank given me a personal loan based on my credit card usage. The transactions i do i get a rewards points on my credit card and i can use those point for purchasing a good. Axis is my first credit card and the customer care service is upto the mark.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent service
Review: My salary account is with Axis Bank. There is no minimum balance since it is a salary account. There is no hidden charges so far. I have had this account for over 3 years. Their netbanking and mobile application are very convenient. Bank employees are very helpful.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I was eligible for Axis bank Personal Loan and proceeded forward by applying it. My loan was sanctioned for 2 lakhs with the nominal rate of interest and the tenure was about for 60 months. Customer service was good update me on time but there was delay to get loan disbursed don't know why. _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good
Review: I am using Axis bank credit card for 5 years they have provided me with the credit limit of 90 thousand. Its a life time free card with no charges applicable. If i do the repayment it get done easy and wont take any delay. When i contacted customer care i always use to get English language when  i asked for other language they use to take more time to get connected._x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very Good
Review: I am holding a savings account with Axis bank.There are no hidden. But 1 thousand need to be maintained as the minimum balance. Overall service is good. I am using both net banking and mobile application which is very user friendly. Customer service is supportive._x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good
Review: I have selected Axis  bank credit card  past 1.5 year there is  annual charger is Rs  499. customer service is good and responsive . while transaction through online  rewards  point and cash offer is applicable. while  document submitted through  executive so   there is  no delay receive credit card .all notification  email and communication. Sufficient limit i provide from banker end.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: I love Axis bank

Axis bank charged me a fee for the credit card. Till now the transactions are fine and i never had any issue on them.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best card
Review: The customer care holding time is very less compared to other bank and whatever the question i have, they used to resolve it very quickly. There are lots of offer available on hotel booking, travel booking, utility bill payment and converting into EMI also.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good

I have opened a family account and I got the family ID only after three months. I was told initially that I only have to maintain a balance of 10K for the first month alone. After I done the same and withdrew the amount later, the bank charges me. The relationship manager is not responsive and proactive to my queries.

Review: I am using AXIS BANK  Savings account for more than few years where i am quite satisfied with the services which they had provided so far. The customer support team & their staffs had always been helpful, there has not been any charges which they make for the transactions . _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very Good account
Review: Since 2012, i have been holding the Axis bank salary account. They have given me a personal loan without any documents because of this account. Internet banking facility and app is good. No minimum balance is required. Rarely i used to go their branch and the employee response is fine.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Excellent loan services
Review: I taken the personal loan from Axis bank and i have chosen the bank because the processing fee 0.99% for the taken amount and the interest rate is 13.99%. I can pre-close the loan anytime after the first month EMI paid. They have processed the loan within 1 day and the amount has been credited directly into my account.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Average
Review: I applied for credit card from Axis Bank. I submitted all the documents on time after that there was no response from the bank. I received a call only from bank executive only once then there was no call or email from there end. It has not been a good experience.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good experience
Review: Axis Bank has provided me a maximum amount of loan to purchase the home, they have provided me 100% funding which am most happy. I have closed the loan. The customer service is better. There was a processing fee and the interest rate is nominal.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Better
Review: I am getting an excellent services from Axis Bank. I have not used the customer service and there is no requirements too. Its been more than 8 years and am using a zero balance salary account. The interest rate is average for savings and deposit.

Review: I am holding a salary account  in AXIS  bank for more than 8 years. There is no hidden charges in this bank. It is a  zero  balance account. I am using mobile app and it is user friendly to access.  ATMs and branches are near to reach them directly. I use to get alert SMS on time.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Excellent
Review: I have taken a personal loan in AXIS bank less than 2 years which was processed directly to bank. On time the loan got sanctioned. As per my requirement I received a loan amount for the duration of 2 years. The loan is still running. The rate of interest and fee are nominal.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card to use for all purposes
Review: I am using AXIS bank platinum credit card for more than  5 years which was directly to bank. It is an annual fee chargeable. The credit limit is much sufficient to use for this card and now they have enhanced it. I use this card for shopping, fuel purpose. So based on the usage I get reward points and cash back up to 5%.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent card
Review: I have been applied for Axis bank credit card for the credit limit, as i was expecting good credit limit from them, but i did not got from them, the limit they have given to me was just 33,000 which was very less as per my expectation, they have not charged me annual fee as it is life time free credit card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have been holding Axis bank credit card from long time, they have not charged me annual fee as it is life time free credit card, the credit limit which they have given to me was good, they have given me as per my requirement, they use to give good offers in movie tickets always.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I've been using the AXIS  BANK   Credit card for a while.  They also offered me a very good limit. Overall it has been a very good experience with the AXIS Bank card and their services. There is no joining per with this card . I am holding tis card for past 1 year . _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD
Review: I am not facing any issues with the card as they have increased the limit often, using the card form last 2 years. I got the hike for 6-8 months once and now i am getting 1L rupees limit, it is a payable card there are offers with the fuel. There is a EMI also balance transfer is there but not done.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: Its been 7 years since I'm using the Axis bank credit card. Whatever the commitment they are doing to the customer, it will happen. The redemption expiry date will be sent through SMS and email. EMI conversion will be available the minimum transaction of Rs. 3000. Payment mode is convenient to use.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Fast loan approval
Review: They have given me a instant personal loan from Axis bank without any documents. They have given me a loan within a minute which i appreciate. If i contact the customer care, they will contact me immediate and resolve the issue immediately. The interest rate is not that much high.  Part- payment and pre-closure is available and there is no charges for that.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Difficult to get a card for non banking customers
Review: I have a account in Axis bank hence they have provided the credit card. The card is okay and they won't provide much offers. The credit limit was less compared to other card. I am using the card for almost 3 years and making the bill payment is easy. Internet banking and mobile app is good to use and they are improving the same on a regular intervals.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent card
Review: I am very much happy with the Axis bank from past two years, They have not charged me annual fee as it is life time free credit card, They have not charged me any kind of hidden charges, the credit limit which they have given to me was sufficient, so far my experience was good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Awesome card
Review: Am using the Axis bank for last 5 years and its a good card to use because they used to provide a discounts like, movie tickets, discounts and rewards points on shopping. I have purchased the credit card in their branch and they have given me a response was well. I'm much satisfied with the limit of Rs. 1 lakh.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Excellent service
Review: I have been holding my personal loan with Axis bank , the loan amount which they have given to me was sufficient, it was as per my requirement, the rate of interest they have charged me up to 13.5% which was nominal, still this loan is running, it has been just 10 months happened taking that loan.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD CARD
Review: I am using the card since from last  few years and it is the first time and i have a good experience but i use seldom. The card has the credit limit also the card has the card is a payable cars of 499 rupees.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Need to decrease charges
Review: I am holding AXIS bank buzz credit card  for more than a year. It is an annual fee chargeable and it is high. The credit limit which was provided from bank is low.The customer service is good whenever try to contact them. In flip kart there is 5% discount. One disadvantage is there is no option for a wavier off.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent Service
Review: I am holding a salary account  in AXIS bank for more than 6 years. There is no hidden charges are applicable in this bank. It is a  zero balance account. I am using mobile app and it is user friendly to access. I use to get an alert messages from bank whenever I do a transactions. Their service is good.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Banking is convenient
Review: I bank with Axis Bank for the savings account. The mobile application is very easy to use and there are more options on it to complete my transactions. There are no charges taken for the banking features. The customer support and response is good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Limit can be enhanced
Review: I hold a credit card with Axis Bank as well. I also bank with them for a salary account. The credit limit they have given me is very low. They need to enhance it. The customer support and response is good but I would not recommend the bank to others.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Need to decrease charges
Review: I have taken a personal loan in AXIS bank 4 years ago, the process took 4 days. The loan amount was not much sufficient as per my requirement. The tenure is for 48 months.  There was an option for pre closure and I have closed the loan now.The rate of interest was high and fee was also high.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good. Can do better
Review: I bank with Axis Bank for the savings account. The mobile application is good as I can track all my transactions online. The services are not up to the mark. They need to improve on the service. There are no charges taken for the transactions I do.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Unhappy with the service
Review: I bank with Axis Bank for the credit card. I am not happy with the services of the bank. They are not able to clarify the details I need about my statements. They need to be more supportive in that way. I will not recommend the bank to others as well.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Banking is convenient
Review: My savings account is with Axis Bank and the banking services are satisfactory. There are no hassles in completing my transactions.The services at the  branch is also good. There are no charges for the same. Overall no issues in using the debit card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good. Can do better
Review: I bank with Axis Bank for the credit card. There are annual charges of Rs.500. The credit limit is also very low. I do not get any offers on the card. I only earn rewards points and I can use those points for shopping. The customer services and response is good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card for all purposes
Review: I am using AXIS bank my zone credit card for more than 4 years. Recently I face a fraud transaction without my knowledge then I raised a complaint and it is under process now. It is an annual fee chargeable for a certain amount it will get waive off. I use this card for shopping, grocery  purchase and dinning purpose so I get reward points and cash back.Their service is awesome.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Easy to bank with
Review: Axis Bank is overall good in the banking services. It is a savings account and the process to complete the transactions are smooth. There are no charges for the same. The customer support and response is also nice, there has been no hassles till date.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Can provide more offers
Review: I also bank with Axis Bank for the credit card. Though they have given me more credit limit, the options are less on the offers. The customer support is good and they send the bill on time. The online banking is good too to complete the transactions.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I am holding a savings account  in AXIS  bank for more than  year. There is no hidden charges in this bank. It is a  zero balance account. I am using mobile app and it is user friendly to access. I use to get an alert messages from bank whenever I do a transactions.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have taken home loan directly through Bank.The rate of interest  and the processing fee was nominal ,directly applied through bank ,The loan amount was 16.85 lakhs ,for the tenure of 20years ,still this loan is active .I have got the loan on time and it was sufficient as well .I am completely satisfied with the service .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have Axis bank credit card through Bank directly.I have not faced any difficulties so far on using this card.This card is having a good credit limit and so far good to use .I have got all the details about the card process through the agent.I have got the card on time and it was sufficient as well .

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Not satisfied
Review: I have been holding personal loan with Axis bank , the loan amount they have charged me up to 4,00,000 they said while applying they will be charging just 10.5% only, but after receiving loan they have charged me 14% which i felt was very high comparing to other bank.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: BETTER
Review: I have closed the personal loan before 2 years, the documentation process was good but there was delay to get the loan. The loan amount given was good also the rate of interest was 24% which was higher than others when compared apart from that the service is good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have Axis Bank credit card which was taken through Bank directly .I ma using this card for the past 7years.The credit limit was very good and it was upto 3lakhs it is sufficient as well .The agent gave all the required information about the card process .I have not faced any drawbacks so far on using this service .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent card
Review: I have been holding Axis bank credit card from long time, They have not charged me annual fee as it is life time free credit card, the credit limit which they have given to me was good, they use to give good reward points whenever i do transactions.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Hassle free
Review: The net banking is good with Axis Bank and I do not have to go to the bank to do any of banking work. The mobile application is very convenient. I can track all my transactions on it. The customer support and the response is also good. There are no hassles.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Need to reduce the interest rate
Review: Taken my personal loan from Axis bank many times i have called the customer but no one responding and its taking more time. The interest rate is more. I have applied the loan amount of Rs. 2.75 lakhs for that they have offered me a interest rate of 17% hence now I'm planning to transfer the loan to some other bank.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Better card
Review: Last 2.5 years i have been using the Axis bank  Neo credit card. I use the card for shopping purpose sometimes i get offers like discount and rewards points. I get a fuel sur charges waiver. There is no yearly charges and they have given me a credit limit of RS. 1.80 lakhs and they are increasing the limit on yearly basis. Sometimes while I'm doing a transaction, it has a transaction failure issue.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: It is bit tricky to use the internet banking of Axis Bank. I bank with them for the savings account. They have a good customer service. They are responsive a well. There are no charges taken for the banking facilities. The bank always provided me offers on loan, just that I have used it yet.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good in all
Review: I hold a credit card with Axis Bank and there are good deals on the card. The card is is not chargeable. The customer services and response is good. The statements are clear and it is a timely process too. The credit limit is also good and the process is smooth.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Good loan services
Review: I got a good offer and their customer support is positive and their process is very fast hence i have taken the personal loan from Axis bank. They have given me a interest rate which is convenient for me. They have charged me a some processing fee. I have applied the loan amount of Rs. 3.52 lakhs and i have been paying the EMI of Rs. 10000 per month. The EMI amount will be automatically deducted from my account.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent card
Review: Holding my Axis bank credit card for almost 6 months. In that i get offer for discounts, rewards points. On retails shop, i get the 15% off while I'm swiping the card in restaurants and ticket booking. I never had any issues. This is a zero joining fee card but i need to pay the annual fee of Rs. 500. They are intimating the offer details whenever its there.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good one
Review: Axis is a okay card to use. I used to get rewards points for every transaction and i can accumulate those rewards points for purchase. I got the credit limit of Rs. 50000. There is no annual fee in this credit card. Overall, i'm happy about the Axis bank credit card.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Service is good

I have not tried their Internet banking and mobile app. There is no extra charges for withdrawing the money from other bank ATM and i don't need to hold a minimum balance. When i visited their branch the response was prompt.

When i approach the bank, they have asked me to pay the full amount immediately with one shot payment otherwise on my salary account, whatever the amount will be debited it will be credited towards credit card payment.

The loan amount has been sufficient and the interest rate with them had been nominal. The processing fee and charges with them had also been good. Review: I bank with Union Bank of India for the savings account. The customer services and response is good. The online banking is good and there are no hassles in the transfers. There are no charges taken for the banking needs too. In all a smooth process.

Review: It is my personal saving account also my salary is getting credited every month. I am using the Union Bank of India for 1.5 years. They offered an international visa debit card. The daily withdrawal limit was good. ATM services are pretty good too.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Better Bank
Review: I am holding a saving account with Union Bank for last one year. I have chosen this bank because the branch is near to my place which was very convenient. The customer service was not up to the mark. They need to improve the service. The rate of interest was good here. Every month I maintain one thousand rupees.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Best banking service
Review: I have a salary account with Union Bank of India from last 3 years, the banking services and the facilities are very good in this bank. Customer service is good, they respond on time and there is no delay in the service. The process was very smooth at the time of opening this account. I use mobile banking for all my transactions. I do online transfer using NEFT and IMPS, i get cheque books and monthly statement on time and upon request.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Good service
Review: I have taken car loan with Union Bank of India and it was a good loan experience. The process was very smooth and the loan amount was approved within the given time and there was no delay. Customer service was good and they provided door step service to collect the documents. The loan amount was for Rs 3.25 lakhs with the nominal rate of interest when compared to all other banks.

Heading: Excellent service
Review: The response is really good with Union Bank of India. They have disbursed my personal loan within 10 days of time . They have offered me Rs.9,50,000 as a personal loan, the required loan amount has been given. The rate of interest is nominal. I got the loan for 10.65% interest rate which came under Pradhana manthiri budhi yojana.  I am happy about the loan amount.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Nice service
Review: I hold free credit card with Union bank. Actually when I availed home loan from them, they offered credit card with free of cost. I do not have any idea about reward points and cash back offers. But I do not have any issues with the bank.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good Service
Review: I availed home loan from Union bank. The rate of interest is 9.8% and I almost done with the loan. I had paid till eleven lakhs still have to pay the balance amount. The services are good with Union bank for the home loan and their customer support is fine.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Supportive
Review: I maintain savings account with Union bank. Actually I am using this bank account since 2014. This is a good bank for banking services. I used to do transactions on this account. I like their customer support and the way of their responses.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Best account to use
Review: The banking service with Union bank of India is really good when compared with SBI. The customer service and the response is really good with UBI. I am using UBI savings account around more than a year. The rate of interest is nominal with UBI.The net banking with Ubi is really good and it is also very helpful to use the mobile application for the transactions.  I am satisfied using UBI savings account.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Better Service
Review: I maintain savings account with Union bank of India. I use this account not for saving purpose but to pay the emi amount to LIC. I had opened this account during the year 1996. So I am banking with UBI for more than twenty years. More facilities are there with the bank like we can deposit the amount anywhere.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Awesome
Review: I am holding a savings account with the Union bank of India from the last three years of time. Customer service is very good  one till now and their transactions were really good till now and when it comes to activation they do it on an immediate basis._x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Customer friendly banking
Review: I felt it is a basic banking, I can do the debit transaction in any ATM there is no charges applicable. Its my zero balance salary account. Union Bank of India online banking is good, it has multiple option like fund transfer, bill pay, mini statement, its all easy to use.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good experience
Review: Union bank of India also plays a good role while it comes to fixed deposit.. Their interest rate is also good one. Customer service is good and their staffs are providing the better response.  Online banking services are working in good way._x000D_

Title: Education Loan
Heading: Good experience in Education Loan
Review: It was a very pleasant experience with Union bank from sanction disbursal and repayment services for education loan which I had taken for my daughters. Very cooperative attitude of BRS Nagar Branch and very quick service too._x000D_I will recommend this for others too

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have been using Union bank account for past 6 years. Whenever I face any problem with this account the customer service or executives resolve it soon within the promised time. The rate of interest is nominal, and it is comparable with others. I am happy to hold this savings account.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Its Good
Review: Union bank of India is really good, their service is also excellent. I had taken the housing loan during the year 2012, at the time they charged me 10.5% of interest rate on home loan. My loan amount is Rs.10 lakhs for the tenure of ten years. I am very much fine with their service  completely.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: SATISFACTORY
Review: Banking services are not that much good with Union bank of India, when compared to private sector banks. For the past 6 year, I am getting my salary credited through this account. I would suggest them to improvise their services with respect to the private sector banks.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Accont to use
Review: The union bank of India gives very good service. I am holding a saving account with Union bank of India for past  5 years. The net banking and the mobile application is good with this account. The rate of interest is nominal with this account. The customer service and the response is good with Union bank . The UBI service satisfied me.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Better Service
Review: Very recently I had opened a savings account with Union bank of India. I had visited the branch and filled the application and gave my documents to open the savings account and I got the pass book immediately after submitting the application. Within 2 days of time they have created my account and I have got the cheque book and debit card  in a week time. I would say it was a satisfactory service with Union bank of India.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good experience
Review: Having Indian bank for almost 10 years. The customer service is really good and helpful with UBI. The net banking of Union Bank is really good. The rate of interest is nominal with Union bank.  I do the transactions through the help of Net banking and with their mobile application. To end up I can say, Union bank of India gave a very good experience overall.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Fast process
Review: Union bank of India did a great job for me for the car loan. I got the loan through within two days and the bank transferred the funds to the dealer in the next three days. The rate of interest was of 9% and the processing charges was normal. Overall a satisfactory experience.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Satisfied with the services
Review: The next bank which I prefer to bank with is the Union Bank of India. I maintain a savings account and I am happy with the overall banking system they follow. They are quick in what ever they do, be it for a loan or any service online and offline. No hassles till date.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Very good in services & deal on ROI
Review: Union Bank of India has given me a good deal on the rate of interest and processing charges. The interest rate was of 9% and the charges are minimal. The services was also good with a smooth documentation process. I got the car loan on time and as required.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Its Better
Review: I am holding my salary account with Union bank of India for past six months, its my new experience it is good. Their customer service is also good. But I am not aware of the interest rate and other charges of my salary account. Overall I am fine with that.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I am having salary account with the Union bank of India and the response is too good for me. I am getting high priority with them because I am making huge amount of business transation with them, so I am getting the good priority. I am pretty much satisfied and the branch manager helps in the good way. I want to suggest public sector banks should maintain the professionalism as like private sector banks._x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good in Response
Review: I hold savings account with Union Bank of India for two and a half years. But I did not receive any offers from the bank till date. Not even approached me for the loans. I use the net banking application regularly, it is quite good and user friendly.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Need improvement in services
Review: I earlier had my salary account with Union bank of India and the online banking is good. Most of the transactions could be done on it. But the services at the bank is not satisfactory and they need a lot of improvement in communicating to the customers.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Service
Review: My savings account is with Union bank of India for many years. Their services are really good and appreciable. They are prompt enough in providing the services. Online transactions are very easy with them. Additionally they also provide very  good customer service as well.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Super card: Union Bank signature Credit card
Review: Visa signature credit card by UBI is really good. Enjoying a limit of 1 L without any annual fees. (Literally completely FREE). No hidden costs. Further, earning rewards points and using them to recharge and book movie tickets. Also, other benefits like 10L insurance cover, Airport lounge access, etc. U-Control app on mobile to control my credit card features. Thank you Union Bank of India.

Title: Two Wheeler Loan
Heading: Good service
Review: It was very good service with Union bank of India. I got a good 2 wheeler loan experience with Union bank during the year 2005. The rate of interest and processing fee is nominal with Union bank. This Two-wheeler loan has the tenure of 3 years. Overall it was a very good service provided by them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Need lots of improvement
Review: I am not getting any service from Union bank, they wont send notification. They don't have much ATM facility even they haven't contacted me. I just opened this saving account only for the KYC purpose, its a nationalized bank, I could use this proof anywhere.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Nice experience
Review: Union Bank of India has been doing good in the customer services. The online banking is good and also the staff at the bank. They were very helpful when I lost my debit card and I got another one without any kind of delay. It is a savings account and.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good
Review: The service provided by union Bank was very good in the credit card.They don't have much special offers but they do give some offers.They are good in service and the functionality of the card is also good. I have taken this card 1.5 years back and used it for 6 months then closed it because I dint have much to use with card. Credit limit they had offered is 85k

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Service
Review: It has been more than one and a half year when I started to maintain savings account with Union Bank of India. They have good ATM facilities. And their customer support is approachable. I am not using their online banking application for transactions.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Good in rate of interest
Review: Union bank of India is the lowest in terms of interest rate than any other banks. It is too good. Actually I applied for a car loan with them and it is in process. So far I am getting proper service from the bank. Customer service is also quite approachable.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: customer friendly
Review: I could say that Union Bank of India is very customer friendly. I opened savings account in the year of 2007. Actually when I was a student I availed their service. I did not receive any preapproved loans or offers from the bank. I have no idea about their customer support.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: The Best Bank
Review: I hold a savings account with many banks which includes Union Bank of India which is best amongst  all these banks, I felt Union bank is the best bank for my savings account. They are good enough in providing service, the bank is very supportive to their customers and they will not let their customers in trouble in terms of payments or notifications on account details etc.,

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Smooth services
Review: I had availed my home loan from Union Bank of India. It was a nice experience and I had no struggles in getting my loan through. The documentation part  was normal and the disbursement also happened on time as well. The rate of interest and processing charges were very much minimal too.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Excellent
Review: I haven't taken the car loan with the Union Bank of India. The rate of interest is around 9.15% and which was pretty good for me unfortunately I had to drop the plan of availing loan the process was so fast my loan was sanctioned with short spam of time. I would say that the services was outstanding.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have an account with Union bank of India. It is savings account. But I am not using this account much as I have savings account with two more banks. I am just maintaining this account. For transaction purpose and all I am using SBI and TMB. But as per my experience, union bank is better.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Service
Review: I bank with Union bank for more than 10 years. I had not asked the for any offers also I did not avail any loan from them. But their services are very good. There is no minimum maintenance charges for my savings account. There are no much hassle with UNION Bank of INDIA.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average
Review: For about 8 years I have been using the Union bank savings account The service is very good Initially it was salary account later got converted to savings and till i have this account I have plan of taking a home loam from them so I maintain minimum balance of 10k.Internet banking I am not sure whether it is till active also I am not using it frequently.,

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Need some scope of improvement
Review: Its a nationalized bank hence they don't have good customer care. Though the branch response is good, phone banking service is lacking. If I call to the customer care they won't respond on my queries. The internet banking is good its normally taking  two hours to transfer the amount through NEFT.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Better Service
Review: I have savings account with Union bank of India. The services are average. I am using an account with them for so many years. I recently applied for a loan but they had not approved the loan. So though I am a long term customer, they are not providing any loans.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good Service
Review: Four years ago, I had taken a home loan from Union Bank of India. At that time, the interest rate was 10.50% I believe this is very much nominal. Also the loan process went smooth without any hassles. Even there was no challenge in documentation process too.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good To Use
Review: The annual fee on my  Union bank of India credit card is five hundred rupees. I have some special offers on my card. Frequently I am getting cash back offers and reward points based on my usage. Also it is very easy to redeem those reward points. To sum up, I am satisfied using this credit card of UNION BANK OF INDIA.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Better Service
Review: For past five years I am maintaining A savings account with Union bank of India. They are good enough to serve the customers in the financial market. Their customer services are much better and they are very prompt in addressing the customers based on their queries.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not Good Enough
Review: I will not say that the customer service of Union bank is completely satisfactory but they are somewhat better. I have savings account with them for long time. They can be little lenient on the loan process. They should fix the loan period to the convenience of the customer.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Improvment needed in service
Review: Close to around 6 to 7 years of time I had been holding this UNION BANK OF INDIA. I am not getting any kind of benefits on this. Also their customer service needs to be improved. As customer play the vital role in the banking sector. It would be great if union bank of India gives importance to their existing customers.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Needed sufficient service
Review: Over a period of 10 years I am using union bank of India savings account.  The rate of interest, charges are nominal with UBI. I visit the branch for doing any kind of transactions. The UBI branches are near to my place. They need to increase the members in the branch in order to give better service in future.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: Salary account is with Union Bank of India it is  pretty fine from the time, I had been using their service. It  is really marvelous, they work according to their time line.  My account is with them for the past 3 years. I am not using this account much. Even though , it is useful for me.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very Useful account
Review: The Union Bank of India is useful for the salary account. I am using this salaried account for the last 2 years.  Union Bank of India rate of interest, fees and charges are nominal. It is easy to open a account with UBI. I can say, it is an hassle free service.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good in customer service
Review: I had not received any offers or benefits from Union Bank of India. I bank with them for almost seven years, but they had not approached me with any kind of offers. But they are very good in responding the customers and providing a very good customer service.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average
Review: My savings account is with Union Bank of India. From my experience it is a good bank, I had been banking with them for the  7 to 8 years I am holding this account the draw back of the bank is they dont provide any loans for the customers net banking facilities are also a good one with them if you add beneficiary it takes only half an hour of time.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I don't use this UBI account often , but got a savings account with union bank of India for my safety. It is helpful to do the transactions with the automated machines. Union bank can do better by providing the good on-line portal for the easier transactions.

Title: Education Loan
Heading: Interest rate part has to be reduced
Review: I had taken an education loan during the year 2010 from Union Bank of India.  My loan amount was 1.64 lakh, I had made some part payment on that. They had offered me good interest rate on education loan.  The  bank kept disbursing the funds on a yearly basis however interest is charged well before that, even before the loan amount is disbursed,

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best bank to go for
Review: I do have a credit card of Union Bank of India, I am using it from the last two months of time. Credit limit value is good one with them and the offers  are nil with them like I can say its a traditional credit card. Customer service is very good with the Union bank of India._x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Customer service is better
Review: Actually this is my first company salary account with Union Bank of India. I am maintaining this account for past four years. Recently I converted this salary account into savings account. About customer service, if we step in the bank for any clarification, their customer service would be better. But I do not know the exact interest rate for savings account, I believe they are providing it for seven percentage.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Better Service
Review: Union bank is one of the bank with which I maintain a savings account. I am maintaining savings account with more than five banks. I found Union bank is unique in giving offers and their interest rate is decent. They have a very good customers service, whenever customer approach them,they were very prompt enough in addressing their queries.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Smooth process
Review: My home loan is with Union Bank of India. The services and response has been good from the on start of my process and even after the loan has been disbursed. I had no issues in paying my EMI as it is deducted on time. I am also happy now that the rate of interest has reduced to 9.85% from around 12%.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Happy with the services & not happy with the charges
Review: I am a customer of Union Bank of India for the last 25 years and I hold many savings account in a lot of the branches. I believe in using the services at the bank than online. The staff at my branch know me well and I am always given the best service when I approach them. The only drawback is recently the bank has been deducting Rs. 150 after four transactions at the ATM which has not been good for me.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: VERY GOOD
Review: They are very good in the service provided related to the home loan process related to the Union Bank of India They require very simple documents and the process was convenient also. I got the loan on timely basis and they were able to assist the customer in a good manner. Loan amount is for ten laks and I have completed 4 years now with EMI of 12700 rest six years to go.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: VERY GOOD
Review: I hold a savings account with Union Bank of India. So far so good with the services and the response has been quick as well at the bank The staff are customer friendly and it has been good till date. I have opened this account because my home loan is with this bank. The one thing I don't like about this bank is for loans or credit card or what ever product it is, they take very long time to process minimum balance in this account is 2k to 3 k that's pretty good.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good services
Review: I hold a savings account with Union Bank of India. So far so good with the services and the response has been quick as well at the bank. The staff are customer friendly and it has been good till date. The online banking is also satisfactory and easy to use.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Okay
Review: I got the home loan with the Union bank of India and their interest rate is around 9.3% as base. Customer service is fine with them and they are friendly. Processing charges are also  good one with them and it took around a month of time for the loan amount to be disbursed._x000D_

Title: Current Account
Heading: BANKING NEEDS TO BE IMPROVED
Review: Though I am longstanding customer of Union bank of India, I was not provided any pre approved loans or any offers.I am supposed to maintain 10k as a minimum balance with this bank. I use online portal as a medium to deposit cash at times I step in to the bank also to deposit funds. The reason why I had rated the customer service as 2 was because I am not all happy with the way they served me.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Trusted Bank
Review: Good Experience with Union Bank for my salary account. I am using this account for past one year. Branch Banking service is good, they providing service in Rural area, villages . Basically they are charging IMPS. But there is no charges for NEFT, RTGS services. _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Should be Improve  Customer Services
Review: I am holding my salary account with UNION Bank for past one year. They didn't provide any offer for my salary account. Mobile application is very useful. ATM service also good. Something is difficult in net banking service, I lost my transaction statement due to some issue but after 3 days I got statement. _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Satisfactaory service
Review: I hold a savings account with Union bank, I opened an account with them from 3 to 4 years now iam using it.If we compare with other banks this is not that much good.It takes very much long time to add beneficiary.and they charge for IMPS and NEFT 17 or 18 Rupees not sure,Maximum withdraw limit is 24k

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good service
Review: I was holding my savings account with UNION Bank for past 8 years. ATM services was absolutely fine. Customer service was good, Hardly I visited the bank, Branch banking services was good. It was a upcoming bank, should improve their process. _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good To Hold
Review: Good Experience with UNION Bank for my salary account. I holding this account for past 8 years. They was good in customer service, also they offered me a loan based on my salary account. ATM services also good. Over all I was comfortable t o hold this account._x000D_

Title: Education Loan
Heading: Easy to reach union bank
Review: Indeed, I had taken an educational  loan from UNION bank of INDIA and it is very good too. I had lost my points because of which credit score had not reduced. Actually at the time of availing this loan they advised me to re-pay the loan after a year, as per their instructions I started to pay my loan after a year. however it impacted my credit score now that I had paid the lumpusm amount my credit score is reverted back._x000D_

Title: All Products
Heading: Salary account
Review: Union Bank of INDIA Salary account is very good. I am holding this UNION BANK of INDIA salary account for about 3 years. No drawback nor any challenges. the highlight of this account it is just a savings account. I do have internet banking mobile banking they are providing. _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Outstanding
Review: I hold a savings account with UNION BANK and Iam a new customer,i have just opened an account with them,when i visited the bank premises,union bank staff helped me a lot in openings account,As such everything is good till date..

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Should Be Increase ATM Center
Review: My salary account with Union Bank  was convienent, Customer service was good, they make a response quick. They have  less ATM services, so they need aware about that. They should be increase the ATM services. If we are using other ATM, they deduct some amount for other ATM usage. _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Improve the Technology and customer's service
Review: I had been holding my saving account with Union Bank for past 5 to 6 years, It was safe and secured compared to other sectors. But I wish them to improve the service and banking technology to make hassle free process. It was a good bank but they should still aware of product knowledge.

Title: Education Loan
Heading: Better service
Review: Union bank of India Educational loan process was very simple and easy to proceed. I am holding this Bank for about 5 years. This loan is ongoing there is no collateral security required and I did not face any issues till date on this loan._x000D_

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Excellent services
Review: Depending on the transactions I do on my current account, Union Bank of India has offered me a Business loan. The process for this was not hectic and I have not got these facilities from any other bank. This was the only bank to help and I am very happy to bank with them.

Title: Current Account
Heading: The best bank
Review: I owe a lot to Union Bank of India, as they have supported me to open a current account which other banks did not do. The services and response they provide is very good and I feel very comfortable to bank with them. They are very customer friendly and it has been a excellent experience till date.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: My bank account
Review: This Union bank of INDIA account was set up with the help of my colleagues. They had opened my account and I am yet to use that. I had got the debit card from them on time and I had never used it till date. Only once I had been to the branch for the closure they had not acknowledged my request and its because of which I am still maintaining  this account._x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good services
Review: It was always a good experience with Union Bank of India for a savings account. The services and response has always been more than satisfactory for me. I use the net banking and also the mobile application. They have given me offers of loans as well. Just that I did not go ahead for it, as I did not have a requirement for the same at that moment.

Title: Recurring Deposit
Heading: Good services
Review: Union Bank of India has always been good in the services. I have also taken a recurring deposit with them. Since I do not have the option of opening this account online, I visited the bank for the same and it has been a good experience. The rate of interest is satisfactory and there are no much of charges related to it.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Satisfactory
Review: I hold a savings account with Union Bank of India. I am happy with the services they provide. There are online features as well, where my transactions could be done. The charges they take is nominal and there has not been any hassles yet on banking with them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good services
Review: My savings account is with Union Bank of India. From my experience,  I would say that this bank is more secure in the online transactions, as there are two passwords. One for the login and the other is for the transaction. They also have a toll free number, where one can get connected directly to the customer care without much of IVR process to follow and they are available 24/7.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Savings account
Review: I have neither operated nor used the UNION Bank account. I am not sure about the closur e letter I have not received it till date. I had simply ignored the account. This was opened during my college days and I was holding this account for the past 7 years and I stopped using that account after which._x000D_

Title: Car Loan
Heading: It is good and its recommendable
Review: My car loan was taken during the year 2005 and it was successfully completed during the year 2009. UBI asked for normal set of documents they did not ask for additional documents. Documents required were FORM 16, salary slip and pan card. I did not face any issues with them till date._x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: BEST FOR PUBLIC
Review: I had opted for UBI account during the year 2005 and I continued with that till 2009. I had contacted UBI for the car loan too. They had not upgraded the account till date  its a normal account and my debit card it is just a normal debit card. _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Convenient banking
Review: My savings account is with Union Bank of India. They are very much good in their services. I use the online facility and it is easy to do all my transactions. I have never got stuck during the transfer of funds. It has always been a smooth experience and banking with them has been hassle free.

Title: Fixed Deposit
Heading: Customer relation
Review: UNION Bank always make the customer feel valued as they provide very good customer service. I had taken this FD at SRINAGAR GUNTUR because it is near to my location. This was offered to me at the time when I visited the branch for some other purpose. Where as other banks does not have offer such offer when I visit their branch._x000D_

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Average
Review: Union bank is not good in providing customer support  offered to the customer for a home loan.Their rates are not put in a understanding manner and they are not transparent to the customer.I do have few friends in the branch and that was the only reason for visiting the branch still.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: BEST INDIAN BANK
Review: I have a savings bank account in Union Bank Of India for more than three years. I do a lot of online transactions as well. So far Union Bank was a very good experience for me. They respond to every query very well. Their online activities are very streamlined and perfect. Even the mobile banking and banking through android app is also very responsive and reliable. I would recommend this bank to everybody.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Services
Review: Union Bank of India portal is feature loaded and it provides lots of facilities for its customers. However, I have not used the same. I primarily visit the bank for deposits. The service offered by them was good.  I majorily use their ATMS for cash with drawals.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Needs to improve
Review: Union bank of india is really strict, when it comes to their policies and procedures. Even for single update also, I need to visit the branch.The tough part is, I am situated in chennai and the main branch is at pune. For getting a PIN or card also I need to visit the branch.They ask a paper proof of complaint or assistance required, whenever I visit the branch.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good service
Review: The experience was best with UNION Bank in case of saving account process.They assist me very well in any query raised with the bank.The responding time is very immediate from the bank.I can update the details with the bank in a immediate manner.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Very good
Review: My car loan process was great with union bank of India which was recommended by my friend.  Within seven days of time they completed the formalities and disbursed the loan. Interest rate charged was 0.75% less comparing with other banks for the new car.

Title: Recurring Deposit
Heading: Good bank to associate
Review: The interest that I earn on my  recurring deposit  with Union bank of India  was around 8.5% per annum. I can withdraw the money at anytime  without any penalty like I can earn the interest according  to time the money got deposited. Customer service is good with the Union bank of India.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Below average
Review: Union bank is same like other government banks in case of saving account process.They have very less branches available for the customer.Customer can make a minimum withdrawel of 500Rs in the account.I have never seen 100Rs from their ATM.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good banking experience
Review: For the past 8 months I have been maintaining my salary account with Union Bank of India. Its the usual salary account with unlimited same bank ATM transactions and 5 free ATM transactions being offered on other ATMs. The SMS and mail alerts are free and are sent regularly. I am not charged for cheque book requests. However their ATMs and branches are not much widespread.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Great bank
Review: I consider Union Bank of India as a great bank with which I have my salary account for a period  of 1.5 years. Their ATM machines are working without troubles  and their customer executives are supportive.  I have not found any negatives with this bank .

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: The service provided was good related to the salary account maintenance.Its basically a zero balance account and no additional charges are applied here.The adding beneficiary process can be completed within 24hours of time.I may recommend the service to future customer for having a account with Union bank of india.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Nice account
Review: My salaried  account is with Union Bank of India for the past two years. They have offered the visa debit card with the validity of ten years if we are renewal the card in future there is no charges.  Net Banking  is simple t o login and easy to do the fund transfer. We can add third  party beneficiary within 12 hours of time.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: good
Review: My salary account is with Union bank of India. The services are good. I do not have any issues with the bank. I hardly use the services much. They do have online facilities, but I do not make use of it. I have my debit card and I use the ATM services. There are no charges taken for the SMS alerts or other facilities offered. When I received my kit, I was also given my cheque book. So I did not have a need in visiting the bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent services
Review: My savings account is with Union bank of India.  They provide an  excellent online facility which does not give me a chance to visit the bank. I do visit the bank for a cheque book or statements. They are very customer friendly. They dont have a specific timings. They are flexible and helpful.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Customer approach should be nationalised
Review: For about 6 years I have been using the Union bank savings account. Now since I have shifted to another city it has been a tough procedure to shift the account and they are being very stringent with the rules and want me to go to the home branch for everything. Being a nationalised bank they should even make the services nationalised and customer centric. I had chosen this bank as I have been associated with it since college days.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Service is really good
Review: Previously my salary account was with Union Bank of India. It was a zero balance account and is continued as a zero balance even after converting to a savings account. Their net banking is very good and I use it for fund transfers, shopping payments, online recharges and mobile recharges. I have been using the mobile app as well for the past 2 years.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I wish that Union bank of India could be made flexible in their terms and conditions.  UBI has a very  good Internet  banking service as they have all the options available. In cases of any changes and updation in the salaried account can be done through online.  we  For the Debit card they charge  Rs.200. Only five transactions are free with other bank atm if we exceed they charge Rs.17 per transaction.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Best
Review: I have the salaried account with union bank of India for the past two years. They have  offered visa debit card for which the validity period of five years  free of  cost and the cheque  book is also given without any charges.  Maximum limit to withdraw the money from the ATM is  Rs.25,000.They have good number of ATMS and branches.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Great
Review: It was purely because the organization which I am working has a tie up with the Union Bank of India I decided to go with them for my home loan process. Being the value customer of the bank would respond me on perfect time. Since it was a home loan it took a while to verify the documents and to disburse the loan, which was good in one way.

Title: Education Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I have closed the educational loan with the Union bank of India and the interest rate is around 11% something. Charges are the bestwith them like they used to charge very less like only the interest rate. Documentation process were huge with them..

Title: Recurring Deposit
Heading: Competitive rates
Review: The best investment is offered by Union bank of India, which  offers 7.50%  as the rate of interest generally for a recurring deposit scheme with a tenure of 5 years but we get an extra 1% as we are a  bank staff. The bank always offers much preferential rates for all products when it comes to staff members. It serves as a very good method of a savings scheme,has no closure penalty and also very  easy to book. It is very much recommendable to others because of its rates.

Title: Recurring Deposit
Heading: Rate are better than most of banks
Review: The best saving programme is with  UNION BANK OF INDIA, I have my recurring deposit schemes with Union bank of India, one with a tenure of 3 years and the other of 1 year. They offer 7.55%-7.65% rate of interest generally but we get an extra 1% as we are bank staff. The bank always offers much preferential rates for all products. It serves as a very good method of a savings scheme and has no closure penalty.

Title: Fixed Deposit
Heading: Highly recommendable for preferential rate
Review: I booked a fixed deposit for 6 months tenure with Union Bank of India as I work with them. Its a very good option to take a deposit since they provide much better rates than most other banks. They provide a rate of interest of 7.65% currently for which we get 8.65% being staff. Its always a good bank to hold a deposit scheme since its a public sector bank and it offers good rates.

Title: Fixed Deposit
Heading: Competitive rates
Review: I have taken a fixed deposit scheme of 5 years with Union Bank of India. Being staff we are offered 1% extra than the rate of interest as per the banking guidelines. The current rate is about 7.65% which translates into 8.65% for us staff. The process and the rates are quite lesser than most banks and the extra interest adds to the benefit.

Title: Fixed Deposit
Heading: Highly recommendable
Review: Being a staff of  Union Bank of India, I prefer to have my fixed deposit with them. This is also backed by the fact that they provide very competitive rates for the fixed deposit schemes than most other banks. Its easy to book the deposit and since I am staff I get an extra 1% on the interest rate. I hold a deposit scheme of 10 years. I would recommend them to anyone for their  rates.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Preferential rate but ATM charges  are levied even for staff
Review: I am entitled to get a prefential interest rate , Since I work with  Union bank, my salary account is with them for 5.5 years.We get preferential rates for home loans, personal loans, mortgages, house repairing loans etc. They also offer overdraft facilities with very  minimal rate of interest. All their rates are calculated on a simple interest basis and being staff we get 1% extra from the usual rates. I use their net banking for fund transfers and its user friendly and secured. 5 ATM transactions are free after which I am charged Rs.16.87 per transaction.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Easy and quick loan experience
Review: The rates and the calculation of interest is the speciality of this personal loan. The documentation is minimal and most details are with them since I am a staff account holder for about 5.5 years. The loan processing including the disbursal took place in a week. I have availed a personal loan from Union Bank of India which is calculated at 8% interest rate on simple interest basis.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not satisfactory
Review: I have experienced down time with UNION BANK OF INDIA most of the time when I access their online facility. It is my savings account with the union bank of India. The services and response has not been satisfactory at the bank. . There is a lot of paper work, the bank requires for most of their services. Overall a lot of improvement needed.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: No issues
Review: My salary account belongs to Union bank of India.  I use this account only to withdraw my salary.  The Internet banking is fast with the bank.  I had no complaints about the bank and have not contacted their customer services. It is for more than a year I am using this account.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Fantastic services
Review: My bank account is with  Union Bank. The services offered by them was exemplary. The response is too good. When I visit the branch the staff are very helpful. The rate of interest is normal. There are no charges taken for any of the account facilities. There are no hidden charges as well.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: great bank for loan facilites
Review: I feel its an awesome service provided by Union bank related to the personal loan application.I like each and every step about the loan process.One  of my friend who work their have assisted  me very well.Union Bank service is good.They understand the customer very well and the behavior is awesome.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Excellent
Review: An excellent experience with Union Bank of India for my Car loan. The process was completed within three days. The documentation was not much. The rate of interest was of 9.36%. And it was a zero processing fee. The services and response was excellent through the process.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Excellent
Review: It was not a difficult process in opening a PPF account at Union bank of India. The services and response was excellent at the bank. I need to maintain a minimum balance for the account on a yearly basis. The rate of interest is good too. There are no charges.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent
Review: My salary account is with Union Bank. The services are good from them. The bank is best for a low rate of interest and a less document process for the loans. There are no charges taken for the account facilities. I am very satisfied with the bank and it services.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: smooth experience
Review: I hold a savings account for a period of 5 years from the Union Bank of India.  It is a very good bank and itâ??s response time is faster.  I am satisfied with all the services that the bank offer. It is actually very smooth to maintain an account in this bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good account
Review: Union bank of India savings account was good. I was planning to continue with that. I did not maintain the balance as I forgot about that account completely. So finally the account was cancelled. As there was no transaction in my account it was closed automatically. I would certainly recommend this as this being a nationalized bank. _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average experience
Review: I have a savings account with Union Bank. It has the usual feel of the Government sector banks as the customer service at the branch is very average. They offer unlimited transactions on their ATMs and 5 free on other ATMs. They charge for the debit card as well as the limit on the card is low. For almost all requests I need to walk to the branch and give a hard copy of the request.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good service
Review: They require minimum balance of 500Rs in the account.They have enough branches and ATM available for the customer with Union Bank related to the saving account.They have got the toll free number where customer gets connected  in a very fast manner.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Disappointed with their service
Review: I have a savings account with Union Bank of India. I have to maintain Rs.5000 as the average quarterly balance and they have charges for statement, other bank ATMs and for fund transfer as well. Their customer service and responsiveness is not at all satisfactory as there is a communication and language gap and neither are they able to explain any charges levied on the account.

Title: All Products
Heading: Average experience
Review: I have an Union Bank of India savings account that I had opened 5 years back. They offer 3 free ATM transactions on both same and other bank ATMs. It was a zero balance account and their terms and conditions are very stringent as well as have a cumbersome processing. The SMS alerts are regular and is chargeable.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Best
Review: Currently, I am having the salary account with the Union Bank of India and am with them from the last  two years of time. There are no drawbacks with them and the  customer service is really good . Netbanking facilities are good, also the error report should be generated immediately.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Best
Review: I got the mutual fund  with the Union bank of India  KBC . Its the one time investment plan and I used to get  the returns around 18% with them as per the latest. Yield ratings are good with them and the customer service is good. Total lock in period around 3 years of time.

Title: Recurring Deposit
Heading: Best
Review: I do have the recurring deposit with the Union bank of India and  the interest rate was around 8.65% because am an employer.  Customer service is good with them and the online banking facilities are perfect with them. They used to provide the feedback immediately.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best
Review: I do have the credit card with the Union Bank of India and the response is good with them. Response is good because its my employer and they have provided me with the credit limit as 50000 Rupees. Customer service is good with them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Needs improvement in customer service
Review: They don't apply any additional charges in the account.They are requiring a minimum balance around 500Rs for the account.They have options for the online.They are approachable towards the customer for getting a salary account maintenance with union bank of India.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Wonderful
Review: I have got the salary account with Union Bank of India and the services are okay, also they are having some policies like they are not providing personal loan to the customers. Net banking facilities are good with the Union bank of India.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Very good
Review: I have taken the car loan with the Union Bank of India and the interest rate was around 9.5%. The loan amount got disbursed to my account within a day of time. The processing charges were nil with them and the documentation process were nominal with them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Everything is good with Union Bank of India
Review: I am using the salary account with the Union Bank of India and they used to give good support to the customer. I been banking with them from the last ten years of time, also the response is good with them. Net banking facilities are also a good one with them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I have the savings account with the Union Bank of India and I been with them from the 2011 onwards. The minimum balance is around 1000 Rupees to be maintained and the customer service is good one with the Union Bank of India.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good.
Review: My salary is credited in Union bank of india  for the last 3 years.  In technology and mobile banking the bank is the best.  It is also easy to open an account in online with the bank.  Overall the bank is very good.  Marketing is required for the bank as all the people can know its benefits.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: give a try
Review: My credit card type is classic I have with the union bank of India.  I am using this for 6 months.  I get 5-10% discounts in shopping.  I am fine with the credit limit offered. And the credit card is free for life time. One thing that is lacking in the bank is marketing.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: bank is doing well.
Review: It is with the Union bank of India I have my savings account. It is almost 2 years I am having this account. I get quick response from their customer service executives and the branch officers respond well too.  It is a very normal interest rate that is offered by the bank.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Easy to get loan
Review: They are very good in the service provided related to the home loan process related to the Union Bank of India.The interest rate applied for the loan was good for the home loan process.They require very simple documents and the process was convenient also.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good
Review: I have the salaried account with UBI bank since more than 20 years i have been  customer.  The service is very good.  Staffs  response is good.  Online banking facility is given. They charge rs.105 for the debit card and they also charged for sms alerts. Only six transactions  are free with same bank.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Excellent !!!!
Review: Union bank of India  were ready to disburse the home loan within one week but  i did  not finalize the property on  time so the disbursement took delay.   Interest rate charged was 9.65% and the processing fee was waived off.Paper works were decent . Good customer service was given  by the bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good experience
Review: The service provided was good with Union Bank related to the salary account.They give the door step service to the customer.I have not tried their net banking system.The customer service provided by Union Bank was really good when I have used their account service.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Satisfactory....
Review: Union bank of India is a government bank so I cannot expect more from  them as like a private banks. They can give more offers for savings account holders like loan benefits and other things. However at the branch the staff are knowledgeable and professional.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Affordable rate of interest
Review: The car loan from Union bank was the correct choice by far as the rate of interest offered is 10% which I think is affordable and does not pinch your pocket. They are customer friendly and the entire processing and documentation was easy enough.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not recommendable
Review: Since more than 15 year i am holding this salaried account with Union bank of India. In  Guwahati it is the  leading  bank. They have less   atm centers.  In the branch  the staffs response are not up to the mark. They do not charge any amount for any facility.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Fast service
Review: The service provided was very good with Union bank related to the saving account.The features available was very good related Net banking,mobile application.The service provided was very fast.In case of loan processing they take time with Union bank

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent Services
Review: I hold a savings account with Union bank of India. The services are very good from them. They are very responsive. They do have a good net banking facility. There are no charges for the online transactions. It has been a good experience with no hassles.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average
Review: As my company has provided I am holding my salary account with Union bank of India. The only advantage is the bank provides maximum cheque books. I found many drawbacks in the bank. Few drawbacks are,  Net banking is not good. One do not get loans easily and 4 withdrawals from ATM's are only allowed.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good in service
Review: The service provided was good with Union bank of India related to the saving account.The online payment option and other transfer related to the net banking is good.They have not applied any transaction fee in the account for making transfer to other branches or banks.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Its fine.
Review: Itâ??s been 9 years I am maintaining a savings account with Union bank of India. Minimum balance of 1000 should be maintained. The services and target sectors are good. The bank is focusing on the smaller parts and are doing well. It could be better if more branches are established.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Fine..
Review: I did not received any services from Union bank of India. My salary account is with them for the past  8moths. Internet banking service was good in UBI. I am using their debit card also and it works good. Still I did not faced any issues with them.

Title: Two Wheeler Loan
Heading: Awesome
Review: It was on 2010 I took a two wheeler loan from the Union bank of India. I would say I had an awesome experience with the bank. The loan disbursement was extremely speedy as I got my loan within 24 hours of time. I purchased a bajaj bike using this loan.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average Services!
Review: Banking services are not that much good with Union bank of India, when compared to private sector banks. For the past 1 year, I am getting my salary credited through this account. I would suggest them to improvise their services with respect to the private sector banks.

Title: Loan Against Property
Heading: Pretty good value!
Review: I mortgaged my home with Union Bank of India for the mortgage loan. They provided me a decent value for my property with a better interest rate. The executives helped me in getting the loan within 20 days of making a request with them for the loan.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not good
Review: There is nothing to say anything about the Union Bank of India and am having the salary account with them from the last three years of time. Response is okay with them and the  customer service is not good with them.  I would like to say that they need to help the account holders.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Its good
Review: From 9 months I  hold my salary account with Union bank of India.   Its pretty good being associated with them. This bank is good at all the aspects. I could find their ATMâ??s accessible in my area. I frequently use the mobile banking facility provided by the bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: The service provided was good with union bank of india related to the salary account.The customer service provided was very good.They are taking around a weeks time to  complete the process.They have enough branches available near my location which is good.

Title: Education Loan
Heading: Good in response...
Review: I have taken my Education loan from Union bank of India. They are very good in terms of response part. Only thing is, they are lacking while uploading necessary information. I closed it but which was not reflected on their on line portal and they took almost 2months for that. It should be improve.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Excellent...
Review: At the Union Bank of India the evaluation value is 80% on the proper agreement value and balance 20% of contribution from the owner side. Amazing to have the home loan with this bank. The best part is floating rate and they automatically reduces the rate according to rules where at some private banks we need to fill an application. Interest rate is pretty decent.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not good
Review: I do have the salary account with the Union Bank of India. Net banking facilities are fine with them  and  its secure too. Customer service is not  great with the Union Bank of India and the responsiveness should be improve.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very professional approach
