Review: They are good in the service provided and they are professional towards the customer.The response provided was very good with Union Bank.Its basically a zero balance account with Union Bank.Its easy to make the instant password change in the saving account.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Easy loans!
Review: I got my car loan processed from Union Bank of India within 5 days of making a request. They offered me the car loan with best interest rate  and they charged me a reasonable processing fee against the loan. Most importantly, the executive used to resolve the queries on spot.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good in service...
Review: I have an investment with Union bank of India. I am being with them for the past 8 years. My saving account is good for transaction part. Sms service are good. Not using net banking but I am planing to start.  have to maintain minimum 1000rs in this account. I have not faced any issues with them.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Excellent!
Review: Home loan process was excellent with Union Bank of India. They disbursed the loan amount in a weekâ??s time by collecting generic documents for the loan process. I submitted my employment details and land documents for the loan process. Adding to that, there is no processing fee charged for the loan process.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good government bank
Review: The major benefit  with union bank of India is that unlimited transactions  are free with same  bank or another  bank. They minimum amount to maintain in the saving account is Rs.1000 along with the cheque book.  There are no hidden charges like the private banks.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Need more flexible options...
Review: Last year I have taken my personal loan from Union bank of India. Their process was very fast I got my loan amount within 1 or 2 days. They offered good interest. Best thing they allow us to make a part payment. Processing charges are higher my suggestion is, it should be reduce.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average
Review: I hold a salary account with Union bank of India. The services are not satisfactory. They have branches world wide. But the services and response to the customer are not satisfactory. For everything I need to visit the branch manager. The staff are not customer friendly. They have good internet banking services. There are no charges taken for the online services.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Additional benefits....
Review: I have some advantage for being account with Union bank of India. They offered pre approved loan based on my salary account. Service are good. They are providing on line service but I am not using that. Best thing their security level. Charges are good.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: With the Union bank of India I do have the savings account and am having this account from the last one year of time. Minimum balance is around 500 Rupees to be maintained with the Union bank of India and the mobile banking application is an excellent one.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Can be better
Review: They are good in the service of saving account maintenance with Union bank of india.The Internet portal is not good like Union Bank of india.The security system is tidy.They dont apply any additional charges in the account.I may recommend the service in case of nationalized bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good banking!
Review: Online platform of Union bank of India is very easy to understand. They do have a toll free number to contact them in times of need. On reaching the branch, the response was quick and it i s mandatory for the customers to reach their home branch for any banking queries related to salary account.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Great banking!
Review: Banking services are excellent with Union bank of India. For the past 2 years, I am associated with them by having my salary account. Customer service is good. As I do all the transactions through online, I do not rely on the ATM networks all the time.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Best
Review: I am having the salary account with the Union bank of india and the services were good with them and am having this account from the  last five months to six months of time. Customer service is good with them and I dint find any issues with them as such.

Title: Fixed Deposit
Heading: Moderate...
Review: Service is average however satisfactory.  Interest rate is also average. I have good relationship with Union Bank of India and I went with them for this fixed deposit. There is no restrictions or charges if I go and close the deposit in midst of the tenure.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Nice
Review: Since three years  i have the salaried  account  with Union bank of India. The service is very good  and in case if we request for any query  it is been solved immediately .  But the net banking is not  working frequently .  If we need any cheque book and atm card we  have to visit the bank .   Networks are good.																											_x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Happy banking!
Review: I was using the services of Union bank of India for salary account with them for more than 2 years. I am not happy with their services as they are deducting charges against the account. Adding to that, they are not ready to provide proper clarification regarding the deductions.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: average service
Review: The service provided was  Average  with union Bank based on the account maintenance.The customer service provided was average.They dont require any minimum balance in the account.The response provided was quite average in the bank.

Title: Recurring Deposit
Heading: Prompt in service
Review: The service provided by Union Bank of India was very good for the recurring deposit.They have different type of plans which are coming in monthly basis.They are accurate about the deposit services and I may recommend the service of Union Bank to others.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Acceptable
Review: The service provided by union Bank was very good in the credit card.They don't have much special offers but they do give some offers.They are good in service and the functionality of the card is also good.The acceptation of the card is wide and available everywhere.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Happy banking!
Review: My opinion about Union bank of India Savings account is, the executives are offering me a  good response on reaching the branch for any queries. The transactions are very fast with them. Internet banking facility is available with them, but till now I never availed that facility.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not recommended
Review: The service provided by Union bank was very good based on the account maintenance service.They do require a minimum balance of 5000Rs in the account.They dont bill any additional charges to the customer account but still I may not recommend the service of Union Bank to others.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average service
Review: The service provided was very good with Union bank of India based on the account maintenance.The are good in service.They are so responsive towards the customer based on any inquiry.They dont apply any additional charges in the salary account with Union Bank of India

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average
Review: My savings account is with union Bank. The services are average. They are a bit slow in their response. They do have a net banking facility. There are no charges taken for the any of the account facilities. Not sure on the rate of interest

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good service
Review: The union bank is very good for the saving account maintenance.They require a minimum balance of 1000Rs in the account.The customer service provided was also good based on the account maintenance with Union Bank.I may recommend the service to others for account maintenance.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Easy to open an account...
Review: Union Bank of India branch is located near to my location and so I opened the savings account. On the same day they provided the kit to me and it is actually nil balance account. I got a very good response from the bank people. Account opening process is very easy.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Nice service
Review: The union bank service was very good based on the account maintenance service.They do require a minimum balance of 500Rs in the account which is mandatory.The service and response provided was very good.I may recommend the service of Union Bank to others.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I am having the salary account with the Union Bank of India.  Mobile banking and the net banking banking facilities are best with them. I can say that the money transfer can be done easily with them. Customer service is good with them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Amazed with the alerts!
Review: Once I visited the branch for money withdrawal. The transaction was incomplete, the money got deducted from the account and the money was stuck in the machine. Even I got a debit message. And immediately I got a credit message as the amount is credited into the account again. I am pretty amazed with the services of Union Bank of India.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Higher charges
Review: The builder have tie up with union bank so I have taken loan with this bank.The service provided was very good with Union bank based on the application being submitted.They are taking around 1months time to process the loan.The interest rate applied was around 10%

Title: Saving Account
Heading: No issues
Review: The service provided by union bank was really good based on the salary account maintenance.There is no issues in the process based on the account maintenance services.The response provided was really good based on the account maintenance with Union bank

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I have experienced the savings account with the Union Bank of India. There were no specific reason to have this account like its near by my locality,so I just go ahead with them. The services are good with them and they need to improve in terms of mobile banking.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: High charges
Review: The service provided by Union bank was really good based on the Home loan process.I got the loan on timely basis and they were able to assist the customer in a good manner.The private financial institute those who arrange home loan are not deducting any charges from the customer.The interest rate applied was reasonable rates

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Best
Review: Union bank  is offering all types of loans to the account holder but not flexible.  Minimum  amount to maintain is Rs.500. Net banking, money withdrawal  and customer support service are  very good.  They have less am networks and branches.  They  give 7.50% interest rate for saving.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Great!!!
Review: On the platinum  credit card  usage of UBI bank they give only the  rewards points  for all the purchase which can redeem into the shopping.   I took the card recently only. If we spend more than 15,000 the annul fee is waived off.  No emi conversation and cash  back offers are given but the credit limit is very good . _x000D_

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Excellent and fast service
Review: The gold loan  process was done very easily by  union bank of India . They took only ten minutes  to complete the process and gave the money . As  i am existing customers  the process was very fast .  They gave the loan  with 7.42% interest rate which was very less .  Took only  gold valuation charge  Rs.200 and there was no  processing fee

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Satisfied...
Review: In response, Union Bank of India is amazing. Several times I visited the branch and individuals inside the branch are very much cooperative. I am not using the savings account that effectively and I changed my contact numbers as well so not getting any updates from bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Completely satisfied ....
Review: My salary account is with Union bank of India. Good thing is I did not find any issues for the past 6 years. I am not using their net banking much. I am completely satisfied with their service. They resolved my queries also. Only thing is, charges and it will be good if they avoid the charges.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Proper response!
Review: Since 2008 I am having my salary account with Union Bank of India. There are multiple ATM networks installed and they are maintained properly. The executives are offering a good response on reaching the branch for any queries. I never faced any issues with them in these years.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average
Review: It is average experience with Union bank of India. I hold a salary account with them. The services are average. They also have a average net banking facility. It takes a long time for me to received the activation code on my mobile. Not very satisfactory.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: United  Bank of India is giving the  over draft and current account facility as u have the saving account with them. Minimum amount  to maintain is Rs.10,000. First 50 cheque leaf  are free and above that  they will  charge Rs.3 for  per leaf.. Unlimited transactions  are free with other banks.For fund transfer within one lakh rupees  there is no charges.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Fantastic
Review: I am having the savings account with the Union bank of india and am having it from the last five years of time. I used to deposit the money with this bank and the customer service is good with them and they are having the enough number of branches across the city.  Staffs in the  Union bank of india is very good to provide the response.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Fantastic
Review: I am having the savings account with the Union Bank of india where am working right now. Rate of interest for the savings account is around 4% and the interest will be compounded half yearly. Net banking facilities are very good like the OTP is good and the current account is having two customer ID.

Title: Recurring Deposit
Heading: Fantastic
Review: I am having the recurring deposit  with the Union bank of india and for every three months I used to close the account depends up on my usage. For the premature there are no charges with any deposit account and am having it from the last one year of time.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Fantastic
Review: I am having the credit card with the union bank of india with the  credit limit of 25000 Rupees and it can be extended upto 100000 Rupees . The services are good with the Union bank of india and I am working there.  There are no offers with them as such.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average
Review: UNION BANK OF INDIA bank does not have good loan offers to their customers. Their bank norms was not so flexible. I had an salary account long back so I approached them for a loan but they were not helped me. But they are good in banking services.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Useful for me...
Review: They are good net banking. Very easy to transfer and we will get amount on same time. I am very much happy with Union bank of India. My saving account with them for the past 6 years. I am not using much this account. Even though , it is useful for me.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not satisfactory
Review: I am banking with Union bank for the last 15 years. The services are average from them. They are not responsive at the bank. They do have a online service. But it is not satisfactory. It is a average experience with the bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Delayed service
Review: UNION Bank of India savings account is fine. I am holding this account for a period of 4 years. The best part about this account there is no hidden cost and we can find their bank where every where. There is no need for me to visit the branch and there is no rush in the bank. Its a Government bank and when compared with private bank the service is delayed.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: easy banking
Review: Union Bank of India  have mobile banking, Internet banking and  m passbook  options is also available by which we can enter our transactions  online. For every transactions they send opt passwords.  They have atm centers with talking machine .  In international debit card the  dollars can easily converted into Indian currency easily. _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: alternative shopping
Review: I  have the UBI  visa planitun credit card which i use as the alternate  for the sbi card.  They do not   have any cash back offers  and the reward points are not useful as per customers requirement.  There is no annul fee. Customer service    response  is very delay  as we have to wait  long time.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good bank
Review: UNION BANK OF INDIA is an very good bank to me. The customers services was great. They will treat the customers as the import guest for them. Online services was piety good and I have visited the bank also couple of times. I can easily transfer money from one bank to another one with out any charges.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Got good loan amount
Review: My car loan was taken from UNION BANK OF INDIA before nine months. I have taken this loan from them because I hold an salary account there. I got 85% funding for my vehicle with the lesser interest rates. Documentation processing was very good and they are doing a good job to the customers.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Okay...
Review: Being a salary account holder I did not received any benefits from them. There is no direct contact number for to contact their customer service. I did not get any proper guidance from Union bank of India. It will be better if they provide loan offers to their customers.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: My existing savings account with the UNION BANK OF INDIA. I am using an debit card with them for long time. The bank branches and ATM centers was reachable. I will be doing most of the transactions on this account only. Account details will be send through the messages from them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not satisfactory
Review: The services has not been satisfactory with Union Bank. The response is slow. Though there is a online facility. Everything can not be done online. I do need to visit the branch. They are not customer friendly. I hold a savings account with the bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average
Review: It is a savings com salary account with Union Bank. The services are better not as good as the private sector banks. The response is  slow at the branch. The rate of interest is normal. There are no charges. They do have a net banking facility. But I do not use that service. The minimum balance to be maintained is of Rs. 300

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Best account
Review: Union bank of India salary account is  the best. The service offered by them was very good. Communication is very good the best services. I am holding this account for 2 years. Banking is nice its very easy to operate services. There is no drawback

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Less number of branches
Review: The major problem with Union bank of INDIA Is the number of branches are very less and the staff are also very less. When I was student I have to spend a lot of time there at the branch for a small task. On an average they take about 1.5 days to action the service request. Even for the cheque clearance they take about 2 days of time. The charges are minimal . I was holding this savings account for 4 years  and its closed.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Can minimize the charge
Review: Union bank of INDIA savings account is 5. Even if I am outstation I can deposit cash they wont charge me for that. I am holding this account since 2009. There is no drawback or challenges. Branch response is excellent. They offer personalized service and they voluntarily help the customers if we visit the branch.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Happy..
Review: Customer satisfaction is very good and can move all the things through online. In starting the Union Bank India has charged 2.50rupees for transaction and I guess still they are charging the same. IMPS transaction is smooth and amount is getting transferred instantly. Happy to access savings account.

Title: Education Loan
Heading: Very nice
Review: UNION Bank of INDIA education loan is fine, its a very nice its a good customer service. Its an excellent bank . My dad is working there so it was very easy for me to avail the loan. Based on my dad's bank statement, his pay slip, my KYC my pan and my University approval letter they have offered the loan . No drawback for this loan. I am holding this loan for a period of 5 years._x000D__x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: My savings account
Review: Union bank of India savings account is good. They have good online facility , internet banking . I normally use their internet banking for paying off the bills power bill ,LIC Premium,all the bills which can be paid online. I dont get any discount if I pay my bills online . Union bank ATMS are very less. I normally prefer taking money from other bank ATM however no charges for that.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Service is good
Review: From Union bank of India  i am having the saving account in which the minimum amount  to maintain is Rs.5000.  They use to offer  loan. In case we have any queries the representative of the bank comes to the place and completes the process.. ATM  networks and  branches are good. The service is also good.

Title: Fixed Deposit
Heading: Good rate for fixed deposit
Review: Union bank of India  is good. Compared to other banks interest rate for fixed deposit  plan  is  high. Maximum 9%  rate is given for the tenure  of one year.  Minimum lock in period is for seven days.  In case we withdraw the amount in between the period they will reduce  1% interest rate.  Through online we can do the payment.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Best service....
Review: I am maintain a saving account with UNION Bank. Best thing is, I need not to maintain any balance. Every part of service was good in this bank for the past 5 years. ATMs facilities an all available in my location. In terms of net banking also I am quiet okay with them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Better!!!
Review: They are very fast. In case of any query if we go personally , Union bank provide us a good and immediate service. Net banking facility is okay. I also use their application is good aswell. So it is good with Union bank.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good services
Review: My home loan is from Union Bank of India. The services are good. I have taken this loan around eight years ago. Where I was not able to get a loan from a private bank. And there were offers only for 18Lakhs. But this bank provided me a 20 Lakh loan. They were very supportive. The rate of interest and charges is good. In case if I delay to make my payment. There are minimal charges

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent Banking
Review: I have an account in  union bank of India  for the past 1.5 years. They gave excellent facility .  Through net banking  we can request for the atm card, cheque book and also do the money transfer  there is no need to visit the bank. They give the sms alters on time for the transactions. ATM network of   the  bank is good. They do have a very good  communication.

Title: Fixed Deposit
Heading: Very good
Review: Union bank of INDIA Fixed deposit is very good. The reason why I have opted for it is because Interest rate offered by them was very low when it comes to FD. This FD was opened at my home town and its next to my place. I have no idea about tax benefit.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good to me
Review: Now a days all banks has the online services. I am holding my savings account with UNION BANK OF INDIA. The interest rates is common for the all the banks for the savings account. Maximum on a day I can transfer up to 5,000 from my account.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: No difficulties
Review: It was used as a salary account and now they have changed it to other bank.I havent faced any difficulties in the account maintenance.They are good but not easy to get the personal loan.They donâ??t deduct additional except mobile message charges.They have provided some interest for the saving I maintain with Union Bank of India .

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Need more benefits..
Review: I am associated with Union bank of India for the past 15years. Being a salary account holder I did not get any offers from them. Net banking facilities are not that much good. Not user friendly as well. It would be great if they improve their customer service.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Need to speed up their service...
Review: Interest part was similar in Union bank of India. I have taken the Personal loan from them. Documentary part was too lengthy. HDFC Bank was better compare to Union bank of India. Even the processing charges also higher side. Over all its fine.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent Services
Review: The services are excellent at Union Bank of India. The response is very good. They also have a good net banking facility. There are no charges taken. The facility is very secure. It has been a good experience for my salary account

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I am having the salary account with the Union Bank of India. I been banking with them from the last 2.5 years of time. Customer service is good with them and the online banking facilities are good with them. They have very grey area in their network to reach the public and they are excellent with whatever they are having. I would like to suggest that they have to penetrate more in to the market.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Very Good
Review: The rate of interest for the car loan with the Union Bank of India is around 10.1%. There was some of the hundred Rupees as the processing charges. Loan amount disbursed within a week of time and it got happens before 3 to 4 days of time. There was  no foreclosure charges like I can settle the loan after the first EMI.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very Good
Review: I have the savings account with the Union Bank of India from the last two years of time. The minimum balance is zero because my salary got deposited over there. Services in the branch is very good and I got the loan approved from there only.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I have taken home loan with union bank of India with the interest rate of  10.25% and they charged the normal processing fee. They took  two  week for the disbursement . Documentation was easy .

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not at all up to the mark
Review: Banking experience with Union  is not satisfactory. The rate of interest is good compared to other banks. Fee and charges are fine. The customer service is not up to the mark. Response is also not good when it comes to savings account. They have to work a lot they lacking a lot.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good!!!
Review: Response was good with Union bank of India. Since from last 5 years I am using their account charges levied are normal.. Customer service is good.  They have  less banks and Atmâ??s ti would be fine if they increase it.  So it is good with Union bank of India.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: No additional returns
Review: I am getting the benefits from LIC only at the time of maturity . They are returning back the same money even after maturity which is not  a big deal. They are not providing any additional amount I am getting back the original amount. In case of any unforeseen happenings I will the complete amount with some benefits.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Great Experience
Review: It was great experience with Union bank of India  as within one  day the approval was done with minimum documentation  and within two  days the loan was disbursed.  They charge  only 10.5% interest rate   for the car loan and with 1% processing fee . I never excepted such kind of service from the government bank._x000D_

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Comfortable....
Review: I have taken a car loan form Union bank of India. Term and conditions are good and simple. Only thing is quiet difficult to get a car loan form them. They have collected very simple documents. They processed within a week. I am satisfied with them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Best bank than other government bank..
Review: Best government  banks and services are fast in Union Bank of India than other public or government banks. We can generate user id and password through online. Technology is fine comparing to other government banks. When ever I do enter in to Union Bank of India I feel it to be private bank. Staff are very proactive so feeling happy to hold savings account.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Easy banking
Review: Online transactions was good with UNION BANK OF INDIA. Whenever I raise an complaint they will call us back within 24 hours which is really good. It is an very good bank as per me and I am holding my salary account with them for the last ten years. No need to visit the branch at any time all can be done in online itself.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Response is  prompt!
Review: Even though Union bank of India is one of the natiaonalized bank, the response was really good from them. For the past 10 months, I am having my salary account with them and maintaining a minimum balance of rs 1K on this account. Net banking facility is very good.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good
Review: I have the salaried  account with union bank of India for the past six years.  They  have connectivity with irctc which is good. Online banking and mobile banking is available.   They charge Rs.120 for the atm card.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Perfect bank for a corporate account holders
Review: Since I a corporate account holder with UNION BANK OF INDIA took my personal loan from them. Recently I have taken this loan because they have offered me12.90% rate of interest with zero processing fees. My home branch is located in my native place.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Shape up or shape out
Review: I hold a credit card from  UBI for the past 1.5 years. They pay back points are very less and we can not redeemed it immediately  only after three months we can redeem them.. The card is not  more customer friendly .  They do not have any offers for online purchases and  in case we want to convert  any purchase  into emi we have to call the bank but the  interest rate is high.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Need to improve in  maintaining customer ethics
Review: I inquired for the housing loan with the Union Bank of India. I dont like the way how they approached me like they have contacted me after some delay and said me to finalize the property and come to the respective branch. Finally I went there but they are not recognizing me, like they are not having the proper follow up details.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I am not satisfied with the approach of the Union Bank of India while it comes to the aspects of documentation and the requirements gathering. They simply contacted me and  just send the mail to me. I would like to suggest that they give the continuous follow up to the customer. Finally I have closed the housing loan application with them.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Average
Review: I inquired about the housing loan with the Union Bank of  India. They have proposed me around 10.7% as the rate of interest with the zero processing charges. They been in touch with me  after little later.  However I closed the application with them because they are lagging to give the response and they are not transparent to the customer.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: No issues
Review: I use both saving account and salary account combined with Union Bank.Its a nationalized bank and I donâ??t have any issue in the service provided by them.Its easy to make transaction with this Bank and get a debit card or cheque with this Bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Guys wake up.....
Review: Union Bank of India have to enhance their services. They have all the services but much effective. The response that we get from them is not good as well. Union Bank of India is government organization and probably that might be the reason for their lack. However fine with the savings account.

Title: Education Loan
Heading: Thanks to Union Bank
Review: It was not that easy to get a loan with Union Bank based on the education loan.I would like to thank them for providing a loan.It takes some time to get the final approval.They required standard documents to process the loan.They were requesting a third party guarantor which I felt difficulties to proceed.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good
Review: UBI savings account was very good.  If we maintain  any amount they will provide an interest for 3 months which I am happy about. There is no  issues as such . They have good number of branches around and I did not face nay  issues or hassle with them.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Lowest Interest rate!
Review: Interest rate is very low with Union Bank of India for gold loan. Rs 1800 will be the maximum amount issued to the customers for a gram of gold. For the first year, the interest rate is 4% and for the second year that is going to be 7%. They are really nice in terms of issuing gold loans.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Happy Savings!
Review: My opinion about Union Bank of India is, the minimum balance to be maintained on this account is 500. For taking a gold loan with Union bank of India, it is mandatory to have a savings account with them. Due to this, I opened a savings account with them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Slow In processing
Review: For the last four years I am holding an savings account with UNION BANK OF INDIA. The bank is very slow in processing. They are providing personal loans only to BSNL employees. I have given the request for net banking services and they took seven months to give that credentials to me. They need to speed up their processing.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I am happy with the service provided by Union Bank based on the salary account.There is no proper response provided to the customer service.They donâ??t maintain any relationship with the customer.I would recommend about their service to others.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not using much
Review: I hold an savings account with UNION BANK OF INDIA for the last four years. I do not have much experience with this bank because I was not using it much. 5000 rupees is the minimum balance needs to be maintained on this account. They have to improvise on customer services as well as in response.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Customer oriented bank...
Review: My opinion about the UNION BANK OF INDIA is one of the best bank. They are offering lesser rate of interest as well as charges for my gold loan. If I will go for more than 1lakh also they will charge just 450rs without tax. Who are looking for agriculture purpose, Union bank is the best one.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not satisfactory
Review: I hold a salary account with Union Bank of India. They services are very poor from them. The online services are not satisfactory too. Though this is a corporate account. They do not give a loan. When I applied I was asked to gather ten people to get a loan. So it could be done all together. They also do not offer a credit card too.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Excellent !!!!!
Review: Union bank of India has the good  staffs and overall the bank is good. I took a car loan with them which was disbursed within 4 days  with the interest rate of  10% and processing fee  charged is Rs.2000 . They completed the work very fast by collecting the easy documents. _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Needs Improvement
Review: I have my savings account with UNION BANK OF INDIA for the last four years. My native place is an rural area so there were no much private banks available. The Union bank branch is located near to my residence so I opened an account with them. I felt they have to improvise on their net banking services.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good banking services
Review: UNION BANK OF INDIA  is very good in banking process. They wont disturb the customers at any time. I am using their net banking services for all kind of transactions. I felt like their bank ATM centers and bank branches needs to be increased.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Loan Under Process...
Review: When I approached union bank of India for a home loan, they served me well and talked to me once. They asked me to submit all the papers and consulted with their legal department. They said that they can process the loan. I got a good response since I went through an influence. The rate of interest they offered was 9.75%, it is a competitive one.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Need To Improve....
Review: Union bank of India has lot of facilities mentioned in the paper but not in practice. I have my salary account with them. ATM services are good but the customer service offered in the branches are not good. It will be good if they behave courteous to the customers and provide all kind of facilities to the government employees.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Above Average
Review: My salary account is with United Bank of India. The services are average. The response is average too.  At times it is lengthy process at the bank. It is very slow.  It is a zero account balance with them.  Been banking with them for the last four years.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: My home loan is from United Bank of India. The loan has not been disbursed to me fully. It happens on stages. Being a staff of the bank I have got a reasonable rate of interest. The processing charges was normal too.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: It Was A Better Option....
Review: Everything is going well with union bank of India. The verification part was very touch and tit went more than 2 weeks. After nearly 3 weeks I got my home loan sanctioned. One can go for this bank for a loan depending upon their job.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: No Response At All
Review: My existing the savings account is with UNION BANK OF INDIA. I am a very long term customer for them because I was associated with them for 12 years. Once I lost the card and I tried for applying for the duplicate card. But still now I did got any response for my request. I am not using this account much.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Vey cooperative...
Review: Experience is not bad but one thing about Union Bank of India, have to enter password for online transaction and so many times I forgot and raised a request for a new one. For savings account holders the rate of interest would be low and they are supporting customers very well.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good one
Review: My existing savings account is with Union Bank for almost five years. It is a most trusted bank. I had a salary account with them but it has been converted to savings account. It is a zero balance account to me. There was enough ATM centers and bank branches were available in the market.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Happy Services!
Review: The interest rate is quite low with Union Bank of India. The net banking facility is good and user friendly. Since I am holding a account with them for the past 10 years, they are sending me proper emails and SMS, if there is any updation for all banking services. I am happy to be a privilege customer with them.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent..
Review: Platinum smart card is mine and this credit card of Union Bank of India plays vital role in doing business as I use this credit card while preparing tender for government related works. Just annual charge is of 299 and some service tax is applicable. Credit card service is fine in this bank.

Title: Current Account
Heading: Everything is good...
Review: Prompt in service and Union Bank of India is a government organization but still they are doing good on my current account. This bank is very reliable and whatever we are expecting, prompt in fulfilling. Also Union Bank of India is good for personal loan, gold loan and other loans.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Better!!!
Review: Union Bank of India, I have my savings account with them.  I opened this account in my home branch.  In case if I transfer any funds they wont apply any charges like other bank hence it is good.  I would like to suggest that the staffs should be little more professional. Maintenance of Atm has to be taken care.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Awesome
Review: I don't have any issues with the Union Bank of India for the home loan which I applied. They have contacted me twice and the rate of interest is around 10.15% which is quite normal. Due to my personal reasons I have not taken the loan with them.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I am not serious about the rate of interest with the home loan which I applied with the Union Bank of India. I have not finalized the property on that time and after I had withdrawn the proposal due to some of the personal reasons. Finally the application got closed.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Excellent
Review: I have applied for the home loan with the Union Bank of India which got closed due to property was not yet finalized and also the credit rating. Services are good with them. Customer service and the service are excellent with them. Immediate response is there.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Best Bank...
Review: I did not expect this kind of response from union bank of India, it was good. They have given the best rate of interest for my car loan compared to axis bank. Since I am an existing customer they collected less documents. Within 2 days they provided me the loan.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good service..
Review: My salary account is with UNION Bank for the past 20years. Till now I did not get any offers from them but net banking  and ATM felicities are good. For the saving account minimum balance maintain rs1000. Specialty in this bank, is quiet easy to transfer the amount. I am not sure about the charges an all.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I am having the savings account with the Union Bank of India from the last 2 years. While comparing with SBI they are good and the customer service is good with them. I have not experienced the online banking with them. It took only 10 to 15 minutes to deposit the money in their branch.

Title: Education Loan
Heading: Average service
Review: I would say it was a average experience with Union Bank while applying for a education loan.They havenâ??t updated about the repayment time and they have sent a NPA notice for not paying the EMI.I have completed the loan within 2years and at the time of closing the loan experience was good with Union Bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Can be Improved!
Review: I felt that the customer service and response is average with Union Bank of India. For the past 5 years, I am having a salary account with  them and they are not having multiple ATM networks.  Once I raised a request for the net banking password and they took around one month to provide the credentials. It would be better if they work on the response.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not good...
Review: I used a salary account of Union Bank of India since 2006 to 2008 but while using that account I faced several issues. Government bank charges less than private but it is vice versa in Union Bank of India. I had visited the branch for something where the employees made me to wait for 3 hours atleast, which is totally unfair.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Need improvement
Review: Union bank of india are not good in the customer service and they are asking me to submit the documents in their bank which is too far me. The rate of interest is around 10.15% and am okay with that and I can say its pretty far than the competitors. The suggestion part is that they need to come to the door steps of the customers to complete the process. Finally my home loan application got closed with union bank of india  because I thought they will make me to roam here and there.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: A traditional banker who requires continuous improvement
Review: I am having the savings account with the Union Bank of India. They are following the traditional banking practice which is not workout in this era. They are one step ahead of the banks like vijaya bank. The customer service and the responsiveness is good with them because they are lacking the customers so they can assist the customers in the better way and can provide more attention  to them.

Title: Recurring Deposit
Heading: Good
Review: I experienced the recurring deposit with the Union Bank of India. The minimum lock in period is  around 6 months of time. Though they are traditional bankers they are giving the good service. Online banking facility is good with them and I would like to add if we would like to withdraw the money before the lock in period means there will be penalized amount of 1% of the capital what is rest over there.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Best option for the economic people
Review: I have taken the car loan with the Union Bank of India. The rate of interest is around 9.25% and which is even less than SBI. The services are best with them and they are not having much  money in the basket like HDFC do. However UBI driving the business in the customer service approach. I can say its been from the word of mouth thats the policy UBI is keeping to run their business. Customer service and the responsiveness are good with them.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I already had two loans with the Union Bank of India which is going in the good manner. Still I have applied for the home loan with the Union Bank of India but the application got declined. However I would like to say that their services and every aspects are really good with them. I am happy to bank with the Union bank of india.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Better
Review: I have postponed my plan of purchasing the home loan to some extent which is the main reason for not taking the home loan with the Union Bank of India. The rate of interest is okay for me and there are no issues with that because that is the lowest rate on that time. The services are good with them. In future if any body who could give better offers in the market means  i would like go go ahead with them.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Banking Services Are Good...
Review: I opened a savings account in union bank of India before 10 years. Customer service is really good. The rate of interest they offer for my savings account is really good. Their branches are less but ATM centers are plenty. They give immediate resolution for customer queries. They have established cash deposit machines which can be easily handled by the customers.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Its fine
Review: Union bank of India savings account is fine. I got  a call from them regarding offers and I need to deposit some amount in the bank and I will be getting  20 k to 25k after which they will provide some offers on this account. They are charging 1% extra more than other banks as interest and I prefer using HDFC Bank than Union bank of India.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent
Review: The services are good at Union Bank of India. I only visit the branch. I get a good responses and the services are excellent. I do not use the Internet facility ad it is a very long process with them. There are no charges from them. The rate of interest offered is reasonable too. I been using this account for the last 20 years.

Title: Education Loan
Heading: family bank
Review: Union Bank of India has been like a family bank to  me. My whole family has been using its services and it is very good. The response has been good too. I have taken my educational loan from them. The process was good. The rate of interest is as per the RBO norms. There was a processing fee but it was minimal.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good..
Review: My Salary account is with UNION Bank, I am holding that for the past 20years so that I am getting good offers from the bank side. Customer service and responsiveness was really good. Interest is 4 % for saving account its normal and over all I am satisfied with UNION Bank.

Title: Fixed Deposit
Heading: It was very good
Review: Union bank of India FD is good. It was a Government bank  and they will provide FD based no my savings account. However I have to hold a savings account  with them only then they can provide FD otherwise not. Interest rate offered by them is the best in the market. I have opened FD twice once through the branch and the other one through online and its trustworthy,

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Not happy
Review: I have got my Home Loan from UNION bank before two years. Through an agency I have applied for this loan. They have offered me 10.25% floating rate oAXIS BANKf interest for the tenure of 25 years.  They wont allow to do any transactions with other branches, every branch of their bank should be centralized for all purposes.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Union bank personal loan review
Review: Based on my salary account UNION Bank of India , they have provided a personal loan to me.The interest rate offered by them was very less and also they managed to offer loan at a reduced interest rate. They did not ask for documentation fee and there was no verification for the same and they took around 2 days of time to provide the loan.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Union bank savings account
Review: I am holding a UNION Bank of India savings account. Its like nationalized  bank they are providing loans for smaller loan. We have to go the bank and meet the Manager in person and they will do the needful for us. I am salary account holder of UNION Bank  and I have given all my details to them .

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good People With Good Bank
Review: I opened an savings account with UNION bank before seven years. Their service is really marvelous, they work according to their tag line which is Good People With Good Bank. They will resolve my problems very quickly. Minimum I should maintain rupees 1000 in my account.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Improvement Needed....
Review: I have a salary account with Union Bank of India. No hidden charges. ATMs are good to use but very less in number. Branches are rare. The customer service is not that good. Net banking is secured but we have to contact the customer care to reset the PIN. Instead they can OTP to do. It will save the time. The services must be improved and they must be competitive.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average Performance
Review: I am holding my current salary account with UNION BANK OF INDIA. It is a zero balance account and their net banking services also good. On a particular day I can transfer only maximum of 20k. It would be more helpful if they improve their banking facilities to the customers.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Its better...
Review: Services are good in Union Bank of India but they are not reducing the rate of interest though it comes down. I have communicated with the higher officials but they cannot do anything as policy matters. It would take some time for Union Bank of India to reduce the rate for home loan as it is floating range. Documentation charges are nominal and it is similar to all the banks.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Received Good experience
Review: I have been with union Bank of India for last 5years and they have provided a good service.I havenâ??t used their online facility available for the customer.They donâ??t collect any additional  charges in this salary account.They have provided enough ATM available in my location.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good!!!
Review: On Sep 2012 I have opened and account with Union Bank of India.  So far I have not interacted with the customer service because I have never faced any issues. I use ti only for drawing money. There are no charges applicable in this account.  The coverages of branches and the atm are good of this bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good
Review: Service is good and fast with Union bank of India as i have the account with 5 years. Including the cheque book the minimum amount to be maintained in the account is just Rs.1000.They charge Rs.112-150 for the ATM card.Interest rate is  4% on the account. Net banking is easy to use. For the neft transfer if the amount is less than 10,000 there will be charge of Rs. 2.50 and above that Rs.5 will be charged.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Present generation service
Review: I am using this saving account with Union Bank Of India and the service provided was really good.They do require a minimum balance of 500Rs to be maintained in this account which is less.There net banking system is first class and I use it for IMPS transfer.They have updated their system for the present generation which is good.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Excellent service
Review: I had a very good experience with Union Bank of India based on the Home loan I have taken.The interest rate offered was rely god and they have sanction the loan very immediately without any issues.The process was really speedy and clarified all the doubt in bank directly since its situated nearby to my home.I have not faced any documentation issues in the loan process.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Nice Customer service and Good experience.
Review: Savings account with the Union Bank of India.The services are good with them like they gave the passbooks and everything is good with them.Online banking is very fast and good to use.I am having this account from the last 6 months.I am happy to banking with the Union Bank of India.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Trust On this bank
Review: Union Bank of India is my present salary account and they dont charge anything .I dont do much of the online banking with them.I used to pay only the rent using this union bank of india.They are not charging for anything.Its in the office compound only so there is easy to access them.LPG subsidy is carry over by using this bank.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Treat the customers in what way they should treated...
Review: Salary account with Union Bank of India was pretty fine at that time so I have opted it but now I am planning to switch over as they have their own rules and regulations.  Customer has to follow their terms and conditions where they are not feasible to customers. Private banks have second option for any kind of issue or query but here we cannot expect that. So far I did not get any value added services.

Title: Recurring Deposit
Heading: Everything is fine...
Review: In an influence of salary account I have opted the recurring deposit from Union Bank of India and as payment is getting debited directly from my account. Union Bank of India is following their own set of terms and conditions which is not flexible to customers. Products are fine with the bank but in part of service it is not good. In regards to rate for recurring deposit, it is reasonable.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: They are Rigid
Review: The property which I  finalized was not approved for the funds by the Union Bank of India.The conversation ends up in the first moment.The suggestion that I would like to say that they should open towards the projects.They should have enhance their portfolio.They should be little more flexible.The best things are their rate of interest and the zero processing charges.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Need to tighen the process
Review: When I applied for the home loan with the Home loan with the Union Bank of India.They said you can reach out to nearest Mumbai branch and closed my application.Upto my observation they are not willing to get the new customers, so the application got closed.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Pretty helpful
Review: It was the same the Union Bank of India contacted me for the home loan.The rate of interest was up to the market charges.The reason why I just closed the application because of  the capital amount what they quoted was not acceptable by them.They are not giving the 100% of the cost of the property.After I closed the application with them also, they helped me to go ahead with the HDFC where I got the loan.Also I referred sister to the Union Bank of India.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Required Patience
Review: My car loan was disbursed in one week from Union bank of India.Interest rate offered was 9.5% and processing fee was 0%. Documentation process was little complicated.I visited the bank i directly and completed the process. Employee of the bank  are very slow and we have to  follow up for our application  status.  The person who has more patience for those only i will recommend the bank .

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good!!!
Review: I have savings account with Union bank. It is a nationalized bank.  We can not expect more in what they are offering. They have set of rules. The service is Average. The online net banking facilities are regular services only. The charges are normal as other commercial banks. Interest rate is very low compared to the other commercial banks.  Minimum balance is Rs1000.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: For the past 10 year i have the saving account with Union Bank of India in which the minimum amount t be maintained is Rs. 1000 and if we fail to maintain also there will be no extra charges. Interest rate offered is 7.5%  per year. ATM centers and branches are  available more. The  net banking is easy to use. Service of the bank is good.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I did not take the home loan from Union Bank as there was some charges for the registered mortgage. The rate of interest was same compared to other bank and so I felt it is better to take loan for a non registered mortgage property with same interest rates.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Average
Review: I did not take the home loan from Union Bank as there was no one to revert me back. Initially they were good in terms of approaching and later there was no proper response.I have mailed all the papers to the bank but there was no proper response from the bank even for the mail I had sent._x000D_

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I had not taken the home loan from Union Bank as I was not able to produce some documents which was required by them. The company where I was working for was not able to produce the documents. The rate of interest is good when compared with other banks.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Bad!!
Review: There was no proper response from the Union Bank for the home loan. I did not receive even a single call from the bank and its been more than a month. There was no update about the application status and so that is the reason I had not taken the home loan from this bank.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I did not take the home loan from Union Bank as the rates of interest is higher when compared to other banks. The executive from the bank was very helpful. The main criteria was the rate of interest charged and because of this I had taken from some other bank.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Typical government system
Review: I did not take the home loan from Union Bank of India as my project was not approved. The executive from the bank had asked me to come directly and meet the bank. They were not ready to have the discussion over the phone. The main reason for not approving is the car loan which was previously running.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: It is average...
Review: Union Bank of India is taking a long time to release the funds and in my case they have taken almost three months of time. Till now I never got the agreement copies either through hard copy or via soft copy. The bank just had forwarded me the blank sanctioned letter where no signature on the paper. I have no idea for delay in processing the loan amount but the rate of interest is good for home loan.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Wonderful..
Review: Interest rate is floating in Union Bank of India for home loan and that is starting from the first day. When I did approach the bank for home loan in the month of March they mentioned processing charge would be of nil but in the month of April they deducted of 16k. Interest rate was reasonable. I would like to appreciate the chief manager Mr.Sudhakar as he helped me very well.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good....
Review: Employees of Union of Bank of India are very proactive. Savings account services are very good and within two days they issues the ATM card. The bank is not charging anything extra in respect to transaction and the interest rate is 5%. Bank is very near to my home so it is easy to make transaction.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Average
Review: _x000D_I just received the mail form Union bank of India that my home loan application has been closed but no reason has informed still. But , the bank is good in service and response as they were quick. The most i liked is that the interest rate is very less with Union bank comparing with other banks. It would be good if the bank informs the customer the reason of closing the application.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Average
Review: I had not taken the home loan from Union Bank as there was no proper response from the bank. The agent from the bank had called me regarding the document collection and so I had requested to come and collect. The agent had refused to come and he gave me a different branch address for the submission of the documents. I did not do that as I was not having much time and so this was the reason for not taking the loan.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: My experience with Union Bank was not that good for the home loan. My loan was not approved by the bank because of the project I was looking out for. I had received a call from the executive of the bank and when I had given the name of the project they were not ready to approve me the loan. _x000D_

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Very Good!!
Review: I have already taken the home loan from TATA Capital and so that is the reason I had not taken from Union bank. The rate of interest charged by the Union bank is lower than TATA Capital. The agent from Union Bank had initially called me for the document collection and after which he had send another agent to collect the documents. During this time I had taken the loan from other company. Apart from this there was no other specific reasons for not taking loan from this bank.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Excellent
Review: I had not take the home loan from Union Bank as the builder is not the same and the dealer had not dealt with this bank. Apart from this the response was good by the executives of the bank and also the rate of interest charged was good._x000D_

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I did not take the home loan from Union Bank as they did not approve me the loan. I had actually requested for a higher amount but they offered me with only less amount and so that is the reason for not taking the loan. The rate of interests charged was also higher when compared to other banks.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: It was not that good experience with Union Bank for the home loan. I had received a call from the customer service executives informing that they will be sending the agent to collect the documents. After which nobody had approached me for the document collection and so that is the reason I had not taken the home loan from this bank.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: The best
Review: I have applied with the union bank of india for home loan.The project which I finalized that was not approved by them.I dint go ahead about the further more details.The responsiveness and the customer service is really good.Finally my application got rejected due to the finalized property was not approved.

Title: Home Loan

Review: I have inquired for the home loan with the Union Bank of India.After that I got  the call with them,The rate of interest was around 10% and am not happy with that.The service and the responsiveness is need to improve.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I have had no issues with Union Bank of India. Been banking with them for the last four years. The services has been good. They also offer a good rate of interest.  I do not have to maintain a minimal amount in my account. There are no charges as for any online fund transfers.

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Good
Review: The rate of interest was around 10.15% with the union bank of india.The service is better with them, within a couple of days after I applied with them , they contacted me.The responsiveness and the customer service is good with them.In the mean time that I got the loan with some other bank.Anyway that I am okay with their service.

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Average

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Very poor..

Review: Once i purchase a consumer durable loan and done the repayment properly, they will provide a personal loan service too. I have submitted the documents of Aadhar card, PAN card, photocopy and cheque leaf. I used to make the EMI amount through ECS. I got the washing machine by them.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Useful loan for poor people
Review: I have purchased a new LG LED TV by using the Capital First Consumer durable loan. If you go for other company, they are charging more amount for cheque bounces charges. They will treat the customer very nicely. Sometimes, i used to pay the down payment for the product.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Best service
Review: I had applied for a personal loan with  CAPITAL FISRT  and it happened to take few days. I never expected  i would get loan on instant Approval, and this is the best part of CAPITAL FISRT .Interest rates is 12% and it is  reasonable here. Over all I am happy with their service.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Faster service
Review: I have a personal loan in Capital First and their interest rate was okay. It was taken before 8months and the loan process was faster and smooth. The customer service is very good. There was a processing fee which was nominal. The loan tenure is 3 years. There is an option for part payment and foreclosure.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Faster service
Review: I have a personal loan in Capital First and their interest rate was okay. It was taken before 8months and the loan process was faster and smooth. The customer service is very good. There was a processing fee which was nominal. The loan tenure is 3 years. There is an option for part payment and foreclosure.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Experience is satisfactory
Review: I have purchased the TWO WHEELER LOAN with the CAPTIAL FIRST i am not satisfied with the customer support with this institute because they are not responsive when facing any issues. The duration for repaying the loan is for two years also the rate of interest is higher.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: GOOD
Review: My experience of consumer durable loan with the CAPTIAL FIRST is very good, i have purchased the mobile phone with them. The customer service is very good also the rate of interest with them is lower compared to others. The duration for repaying the loan is for 20n days.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Simple and best
Review: I have contacted the customer care of capital first regarding the loan and the response was fine. I have bought new AC in the year of 2018. I have made the down payment of Rs. 10000 and the air-conditioner cost was Rs. 25000 balance amount has been converted into EMI for past 10 years. Still the loan is going on and its going to complete in 3 months.

Title: Personal Loan

Title: Personal Loan

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Loan process is good

Executive came to my place and collected. Overall, it was a smooth processing of getting the loan.

Title: Other Loan

Title: Personal Loan

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Good Experience

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Speedy Process

I got brochures from Capital First on time.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Average experience

Title: Other Loan

I'm unable to reach our their customer care people.  I'm planning to close this loan.

All the Loan I took at a 0% and their processing fee is around Rs.350, which I feel is quite good. I have closed all of this Loans now except my Personal Loan with them.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Best service
Review: My personal loan experience with Capital First was very good, the loan amount was for Rs 50000 with the rate of interest of 11% which is nominal when compared to all other sources. The process was very smooth and it took 3-4 days for the loan amount to get disbursed. Customer service was good and they followed up correctly. The processing fees was nominal and the tenure of the loan  is 3 years.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Good service
Review: I have my consumer durable loan with CAPITAL FIRST 2 months back.The processing fee was nominal and its a 0 % interest rate which was an added advantage here. The tenure  period  was 8 months and the loan process was good.  They have sanctioned  the loan with the committed time.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: System is wrong
Review: Their system I felt is pretty wrong. I was not able to make any payment for the Loan. Even after making the payment with the fine, I was charged the fine the second time also. I took a LED using their services worth Rs.30000. They offered me this Loan at a 0% Interest Rate.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Experience is good
Review: I have completed almost 2 years of premium in this Loan and have 1 year left in it. I got the Loan pretty immediately, the whole amount got disbursed within 2 days. Their Rate of Interest is a little high. Their Customer service is very efficient.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Decent Loan
Review: I took this Loan a few years ago and they have been pretty good throughout. They offered me the Loan immediately and the Rate of Interest offered by them is pretty nominal. The process for applying the Credit Card is very short and doesn't require huge paper work.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Average
Review: I have taken a personal loan with Capital First before 2 or 4 months back. The loan process was simple. The executive came to my place and collected the documents. The rate of interest was high, they offered around 14% and charge processing fee separately.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Good service
Review: I have taken a Consumer durable loan with Capital First.The loan amount  t is 48,000 They had processed the loan with zero rate of interest.The tenure is for 12 months its still active.I pay amt EMI through an ECS payment.The net banking and mobile App is good.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Took 2 Loan
Review: I took two Rs.1 Lakh loan from Capital First and the overall experience with it has been alright. I got the Loan almost immediately and the process was pretty smooth. The Rate of Interest offered by them is pretty high. Their Customer service is pretty good too.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Now they have improved
Review: I have heard that Capital First have improved tremendously from the time I used it. I took a Two Wheeler Loan with them and up to the repayment of the EMI everything was fine. But to get a NOC it nearly needed me to go to their Branch at least 5 times. It was always crowdy.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Best service

The loan amount was for Rs 44000 with the rate of interest of 11.99%which is nominal when compared to other sources. The process was very smooth and the loan amount was approved within a day. Customer service was good and they gave EMI card and tenure of this loan is 24 months.

Title: Other Loan

Review: I had applied for a car loan from capital first for an amount of 2.7 lakhs.Rate of interest is high as compared to other banks in the market.Process took some days to complete, skipped my plan  to a different source hence closed it.Bank should reduce the interest rate for the  benfit of the customer

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Good service
Review: I had applied for a car loan with capital first for an mount of 1.5 lakhs.i get fake calls representing the bank hence closed the application and they too many offers for the customer and its quite confusing to choose the right product and not easy to understand the features.

Heading: Good

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Poor

I have taken 1L 96K with  tenure of 40months. Monthly payment is going to be Rs.6065, initially they said around 4000 for 60 months then later they changed. _x000D__x000D_

The customer support is good with Capital first. I would say the transparency is seen in their process. I am satisfied with the capital first consumer durable loan.

Title: Car Loan

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Excellent
Review: I have taken my personal loan with CAPITAL FIRST 2 months back. The loan amount was 1.82 lakhs and the interest rate was 14% which is high . The EMI period was 38 months, The customer service and responses was  up to the mark. The loan process was also really easy and comfortable. There was no delay at all. The processing fee was 2% which is average and they have provided door step service for the documentation collection, They have detected 2,500 for Insurance which is not there with HDFC loan process

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Average service
Review: I have applied for the car loan from CAPITAL FIRST, i did not take the car loan because of personal reasons. When ti comes to customer service, it was average because they did not arrange for Hindi assistance. The rate of interest was satisfactory when compared to other sources.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Bad
Review: I have applied for my personal with CAPITAL FIRST 2 years back since I had two consumer loans here with good  record track  and my credit score was also not low. I  have submitted all the documents since they said Its a free approval plan first and  later they have rejected my application,  so I approached the bank  to know the reason but they did not respond properly and made me to wait for 2 hrs which was disappointing.  I was looking for 1.5 lakhs and the rate of interest was 15% which was really high than other banks.

Title: Car Loan

My overall experience was not bad and and its not recommendable.

Title: Personal Loan

Review: I have approached capital first for my car loan. Their rate of interest was 14% which was high than other banks. However their customer service and responses was good.They have rejected my application because  I could not submit my vehicle documents and insurance. My overall experience was good.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Not good
Review: I would like to give 2.5 for Capital first for the car loan. I did not get a better deal and good offer from Capital first for the car loan that is why I had not taken the car loan from Capital first _x000D_

Title: Car Loan
Heading: High on ROI and charges
Review: I have not taken the car loan from Capital first as they were very high on the rate of interest. It was around 15% and I finally took the new vehicle through another source. The services was on time. They contacted me and informed me the details.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Extremely High on ROI & charges
Review: I have not taken a car loan from Capital first because they have not provided me with a good offer. They did not offer me the loan amount I was in need off. The interest rate was also extremely high. It was a rate of 21%. The charges was also on the higher side.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Not bad
Review: I have approached CAPITAL FIRST for my personal loan through online. I have cancelled my application later due to my personal reason. However their rate of interest as 16% which is very high comparing to others banks and the charges also.My overall experience was not bad and I would like to rate 4 out of 5 overall.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: EXCELLENT
Review: The overall personal loan service with Capital first was good, rather I would say it is an hassle free service. They have disbursed my loan within 3 to 4 days time. The rate of interest was high with Capital first 28%. The processing fee was average with capital first and the tenure was for a period of 3 years.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Services are good and high on ROI
Review: Capital first is good and the overall experience was on time for the car loan. It was a good process and the documents was collected on time too.  The interest rate was on the higher side. I got a rate of around 14% and the processing charges was also high. Else the after loan services was good.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Experience is good
Review: Capital first was very good in the customer services. I got the personal loan on time and the process for it was perfect. There were no hassles in the documentation. The interest rate and processing charges was high. It was around 16%. They are still recommendable for the process.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Not Approachable service

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Delayed process
Review: It was overall a good experience with Capital first. Just that they took a very long time to disburse the car loan. The interest rate was high, it was of 14.5% and I am not sure on the processing fees as I have not yet received the welcome kit.
