Title: Other Loan
Heading: Fast Service
Review: I purchased a home theater with the help of consumer durable loan from Capital First. The loan is still running. The installments are very simple. I had received a good customer support from them during the loan process and received the loan on time.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Quick Process
Review: Capital First is a good place for consumer loans. I bought TV with the help of Capital first. The processing fee was around 200 something I guess. And there is no interest rate for the loan. Installment type of payment is comfortable. Moreover they provide quick service.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: High Interest Rate
Review: Capital first contacted me properly in order to process the car loan. I had received proper followups but I came to know that the rate of interest is very high with Capital when compared with other financial institutions and the banks so I just dropped my plan.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Approachable
Review: For the first loan we need to pay the processing fee and from the second time onwards there is no such charges applicable. I had taken refrigerator through capital first with zero percent interest rate. The customer approach was good and approachable.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Average
Review: I am using my new INDIANOIL CITI PLATINUM CARD.  I was delivered on time. Citi bank has given very less credit limit. I am expecting 1 lakh and above. It is a lifetime free card. I am having a hard time to pay my bills and it takes 2 days to reflect my payment.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I am using Citi Bank credit card which i have taken directly through Bank only  .I am using this credit card for the past 3 years ,I have got very good credit limit and the card process was clearly  shared by the agent ,I have got this credit card on time .This is a free card and also  customer service was really good and helpful .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Card
Review: I have taken CITI bank credit card more than a month which was processed through an online. I received a card on time and the process was smooth. It is an annual fee chargeable card and the credit limit is sufficient. I use this card for many purposes

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent
Review: I am using CITI bank credit card for more 4 years which was processed directly to bank. I would like to say it is a best bank and the customer service is prompt and proactive on calls. It is a life time free credit card. The credit limit is good which was given from bank.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Better Card
Review: On this CITI bank credit card, i haven't received the statement to my mail address and residential address. My card was taken 1.5 months back. I hold a rewards card and i need to check the offer details. I can do a purchase by using my rewards points.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good service
Review: I have Citi Bank credit card which was applied through Online .I am using this card these days it is good to use and easy to access as well .I have got all the details about the card process ,I have not faced any drawbacks so far  ,This is a free card and there are good reward points as well as cash back offers as well .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Better Card
Review: I have purchased the CITI bank card without any reason and i forgot about the offer details. They have given me a limit of Rs. 90000 which i'm delighted with it. I'm not aware of the annual charges on the welcome call, they have intimated me about the charges details.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Should be transparent in the charges
Review: I have been using CITI credit card for long time, honestly I don't see the benefits, but it helped me when I need of money interms of payment, balance transfer, cash withdrawals. But there was some loop holes are there hence I am not understandable about the charges. But I am happy with the points for 8000 points I convert into Rs. 3000 change.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent
Review: I had applied a Citi REWARDS CARD through Bankbazaar. It's a life time free card. Features of this card is good .I am really not happy with their emi procedure. Credit limit is nominal and it is a lifetime free card. They delivered the card on time.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have applied for Citi Bank credit card which was applied through Online .I have not started using this credit card ,The credit limit was really less and it was upto 50,000 only .I have got all the required information about the card process through the agent .I am really comfortable with the service.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Process is good
Review: Citibank has offered me a credit card. The customer services are good and they were on time to complete my paper work. I got no information on the charges until I see the statement I would know the details. I am not sure about the offers they provide as well.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Credit limit should be increased
Review: CITI Bank credit card process was easy, the bank have taken only 15 days to dispatch the card to my address. I got the credit limit its lower, I expected Rs. 1 lakh but I got Rs. 56,000 it can be increased. I have chargeable card its around 499 its minimal its fine for me.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent Service
Review: I have Citi Bank credit card which was taken through Online .I am using this credit card so far ,There was no drawbacks faced on the usage ,I have got all the relevant details about the card process,The credit limit was really good and the process was a hassle free one .This is a chargeable card and i am satisfied  with the service ._x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Satisfactory
Review: I have taken the Citibank credit card. The process to get the card is good. The customer support and response is timely. There are annual charges for 590 which gets waived off if I am using the card to a certain limit. The credit limit provided is good too.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Better Card
Review: The card is very much useful for the transaction of minimum amount to higher amount and nothing problem with the card. Some offers are available exclusively available for this card and there is no additional charges like fuel sur charge waiver, EMI conversion charges.  So far i have done less number of transactions.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Good service
Review: I have been taken Credit card loan with CITI bank, their service is good, they have given me sufficient loan amount, and the rate of interest they have charged me was less, and their is no processing fee they have charged me , and no hidden charges they are asking, overall service is good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have been holding CITI bank credit card for recently, they have not charged me annual fee as it is life time free credit card, they have given me good credit limit , i am happy with the credit limit which they have given to me is good, but their interest rate is very high.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good for fuel fillings
Review: I am using Indian Oil credit card it gives lots of points based on the transaction and I have option to redeem points into fuel filling. The credit limit is also good for 150 I get one point and at fuel station I get 4 points for 150 rupees.  The value is good around one rupees for each point.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Experience is good
Review: It was a convenient process to get the credit card from Citibank. My documents was taken on time and I also received the card on time as well. It is a life time free card. The credit limit is satisfactory. In all I am okay with the process as it is hassle free.

Heading: Average card

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good for frequent travelers
Review: I was told my Citi card will be delivered in two working days  but it was delivered after two weeks of time. The process was not streamlined hence I suggest the processing duration should be reduced. Reason to chose Indian oil card it has discounts on the fuel fillings._x000D__x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have a CITI rewards card and i have visited their branch based on the customer care request but for past 1 year i have not received the add on card. They forwarded all the documents to the bank but bank people are sending to the cell centre after that there is no prompt response.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Perfect card who looks for fuel and shopping
Review: I saw the features what they have provided and the Indian oil card i have chosen because i use the card for mostly for fuel purpose and its a better for me thats the reason i have opted for this. In Indian oil petrol bunk, i get the sur charges waiver and getting rewards points. If i have any other card, i won't get this much benefits.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good for Riders
Review: Citi bank is good in customer support and they are providing discount for the fuel filling at Indian oil petrol bunk because I have petroleum card and also some cash back offers are for the shopping,grocery with emi facility. The credit limit is also satisfactory for me.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: User friendly card
Review: I have not approached the customer care so far hence i have no idea about their call centre people. We have buy1+get1 ticket free and we have a cashback on makemytrip. In Indian oil petrol bunk, i get a fuel waiver with all these things, i have purchased this card so far i have explored all this. I did not have faced any issue so far.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good credit card
Review: My credit card process went well with CITI bank, the field executive contacted me for the documentation process. I haven't started using the card, the pin generation was good. The credit limit is also satisfied and the card accessibility is convenient to use anywhere.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best in Class
Review: I got a best card among all the competitor because they are offering the credit limit and the special offer on the dining with their partner. Since the options are available on the mobile app, i don't need to call the customer care itself. Everything will be available on the fingertips.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good for frequent travelers
Review: I am holding mile stone card its gives fuel surcharges and also they give airport lounge and air miles. I am using CITI card for last four years, hence they keep increasing the limit based on my transactions. The customer support is also good._x000D__x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I am using Citi Bank credit card which i am using more than 2 to 3 years .I have taken this credit card directly through Bank ,While submitting the documents there was no issues .This was a free card and  got the credit card on time .There was no difficulties faced so far on using this credit card .The agent gave all the required details very clearly ._x000D_

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Better Loan services
Review: I have a personal loan from CITI bank which is a top up loan.  Compared to other banks the interest rate is low, hence i have got the loan with them.  Taken the loan amount of Rs. 1.20 lakhs and there was a processing fee of 2%.  The charges are not convenient for me.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent Card
Review: I have a CITI rewards card based on that they have provided the loan and they have increased the limit on regular intervals. I get rewards points and cashback which can be converted into cash. Nearly 5 years i hold this card without facing any issue.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I was checking simply for CITI bank credit card through on line portal, but my application got created anyhow, i requested to close the application as i already hold much credit card i did not required more , their customer care service is good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Need to provide more discounts
Review: I am using CITI bank rewards credit card for more than one year. It is an annual fee chargeable which is given from bank.The credit limit which is given for 75 thousands are sufficient. I use this card for shopping , fuel and restaurants purposes. Based on the usage I get reward points and cash back. No discounts I have receive so far for this card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I am using Citi Bank credit card which was  got through directly .I have got all the relevant details about the card process ,I have got very good credit limit and this card is easy to use ,I have not any difficulties so far ,I have got the card on time and having good reward points and also cash back offers .I am using this card for the past 3 years .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have been holding CITI bank credit card from long time, they have not charged me annual fee as it is life time free credit card, the credit limit which they have given to me was good, they have given me as per my expectation, they use to give good offers.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have Citi Bank credit card which was directly taken through Bank .I am using this credit card from the year of 2008 so i am using for the past 11 years .I have got all the required details about the card process ,I have got the credit card on time,The credit limit was good and there was no drawbacks so far .I am really satisfied with the service .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card for all purposes
Review: I am holding CITI bank credit card for more than 5 years. Their service is good and so far no issue. It is a life time free credit card and the credit limit is good.I use this card for shopping, restaurants and also get many loans offer. It is applicable for dining and airport lounges. I use to get reward points based on the usage.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Need to decrease charges
Review: I have taken a personal loan in CITI bank before 2 months ago. Since it is a pre approval loan documents are not required and process was smooth. The loan was sufficient for the tenure of 3 years. The rate of interest and fee are high.On time loan got sanctioned.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD
Review: I am having the credit card with the CITI BANK where there are good credit limit also there are good benefits available with the card. The card is the payable card but there is a waver off option is there with the card. There is a difficulty by remembering the PIN number of the card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent
Review: I have selected Citi cash back credit card  past 1.5 year every  while spending  monthly  Rs 70,000 .I will receive  cash back offer   every month Rs 500.The  annual charge is applicable  Rs  500. customer service  is good and responsive .sufficient limit i provide from banker end  . Mobile application user friendly

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent Service
Review: I am holding a salary account  in CITI bank for more than 5 years. There is no hidden charges in this bank. It is a  zero balance account. I am using mobile app and it is user friendly to access. I use to get an alert messages from bank whenever I do a transactions. ATMs and branches are not near to reach them.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent
Review: I have a Citi Bank credit card. I received the card on time. Credit limit is pretty much ok. Annual fee is application, they are charging Rs. 1 thousand p.a. I have been using this card over the last 3 years. I am getting cash back and reward points.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Okay Card
Review: Purchased my CITI rewards card 2 years back and the limit was Rs. 85000 and i didn't ask them to enhance my limit and they have not given any offer as well. Annual fee is there and it will get waived off. I don't redeem my rewards points since I'm not aware of the procedure.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: EXCELLENT
Review: It is a excellent card where they are providing loans offers with the card also there are offers with the book my show discounts, and some other offers are also available. It is a life time free card also billing is easy and comfortable to use with the bank.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Branches are less in CITI bank
Review: In the year of 2004, i had a credit card with CITI  bank and i lost the card. CITI bank service was quite fine and they have sent me a bill of huge amount and i didn't block the card and I'm not aware of the fraudulent activity. I denied to pay that amount after that i did final settlement with the amount finally i got my NOC letter.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD
Review: The best feature with the card is there are good rewards points in a year i am getting 1500 rupees. It is a payable card but there is a waver off option is there. The credit limit given with the card was good. There are EMI and balance transfer but i  have not availed.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Awesome card

For the card up-gradation, i have given all the documents but after that there was no response from them.

Title: Credit Card

Title: Credit Card

Review: I hold a credit card with Citibank and the services are really good. I get the necessary offers and the  limit is also to my expectation. There are no hassles while using my card, it is accepted all over and the statements was sent on time and there is no difficulty.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good
Review: I had applied for a CITI CASHBACK CARD from Citi Bank. They closed the application as I don't have proper address proof. Their annual fee is Rs. 1000. They informed me that I have to spend minimum Rs. 30 thousand a year.  Credit limit is nominal.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Good
Review: I have applied a personal loan from Citi Bank. Their rate of interest is high but loan amount which i have applied is sufficient when compared to other banks. but the citi bank team has not processed my loan  amount for unknown reason. The customer service is good and helpful.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have Citi  Bank credit card which was directly taken through Bank.I am using this credit card for so far and this is a free card and there was no difficulties ,I am using this credit card for the past 4 years.The credit limit was really good and it was sufficient as well .There are good reward points as well as cash back offers.

Title: Credit Card

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good

Title: Personal Loan

Review: I have applied the personal loan from CITI but i did not get it. Since i had a loan with other bank i have chosen CITI bank. I have applied the loan amount of Rs. 3 lakhs for the tenure period of 5 years and they have not informed me about the rejection reason.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent
Review: I have a salary account with Citi Bank. My experience with Citi Bank so far has been great. It is a zero balance account. I am having this account for the last 2 years. Mobile application is so helpful that I never have to call the their customer support.

Heading: Neeed to provide more loan amount & less the charges

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Nice Loan service
Review: I applied the loan from CITI bank without any reason and i applied the amount of Rs. 8 lakhs. Since i have a existing loan with some other bank they have rejected the loan and they want a Office Landline number or Official mail id which i do not have. The has been dropped because they haven't informed me about the interest rate.

Review: I have received my CITI REWARDS CARD from Citi Bank. Verification process was very smooth. Citi Bank customer service is really great. They collected the documents on time and delivered the card time. Credit limit is low. They promised me 1.5 lakh but when I received the card credit limit is only Rs. 60 thousand.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Average Service
Review: I have applied for Citi Bank credit card which was applied through Online .I have got all the required details about the card process ,I have submitted documents and then not got any response hence not got the credit card.There was no difficulties faced so far  when applied this credit card .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: Its been successful 1 year with CITI  BANK  and never faced any issue.Very much happy with CITI. Here you get the more Ree-deem Offers and in-cash offers. Transactions has been always a good one with this card. Your queries get always answered by the customer service people. Overall it is good card . _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Average card
Review: I have selected Citi  bank India oil petroleum  past 3 years ago . Its annul chargers Rs 499 while spending  amount annul Rs 30,000 1st annual chargers wil be  waived off  . Customer service is good and response .Customer service is good and response .Iam using through mobile application user friendly .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good
Review: I am using a Citi bank platinum credit card for the last 2 years. Credit limit was Rs. 75 thousand then they increased the credit limit to 1.2 lakh. There is cashback offer and reward points. I am using this card for online shopping and refilling petrol.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Not satisfactory
Review: I have chosen Citibank personal loan  for doing balance transfer for my existing loan of 5.20 lakhs. The rate of interest is of 12.5% and the customer service is not good and responsive. The documents was collected by the executive. From banker end I received an email that the application got rejected.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have recently applied for Indusind bank credit card through on line portal, their service was good, but my application got closed because of unable to contact me whenever they contact i use to be in office or use to drive so no response from my end they closed the loan,the reason for choosing this bank is because my friend had referred me about this bank.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD
Review: I am holding the card recently with CITI BANK before 2 days, the documentation process was through offline. The credit limit given with the card was 75K it is lesser, it is a payable of 899 and from 2nd year it is free card. I have not started using the card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have cITI   Bank credit card which was taken through Bank directly .I am using this credit card almost t 5 years .I have got all the details about the card process through the agent .The credit limit was  really  good and so far not faced any drawbacks .This is a free card and have wonderful  cash back offers and reward points so far not faced any difficulties on using this credit card .

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Processing time is quick and more responsive
Review: CITI bank process is really good. The repayment charges like fore-closure and  pre-closure charges are bit high. Rate of interest is feasible and there are lots of restriction to make the partial payment and the charges are on higher side. We can done only in a particular times for a twice in a tenure period. I have rejected the loan its because of the fore-closure charges and there is no need after that.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Better card
Review: I have a credit card from CITI bank which is a cashback card and they have provided me a limit of Rs. 60000 and 2 years back, i have purchased the card. This is cashback card hence i can convert this cashback into cash. Its easy to make the bill payment through online. I never had any issue from this card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I am happy with the interest rate with CITI  BANK . The documentation was done very well they come to my place to collect document .  Benefits were attractive with this card like  discount in amazon , flipkart , offers on shopping .There were  annul fee with this card . Overall it is good . _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good
Review: I am holding Citi  bank saving account using through  past Eight  year ago , Customer service is good and responsive . Near by location ATM  is more .Iam using through mobile application and net banking its is user friendly application.I will recommend to my friends.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have applied for Citi Bank credit  card through Online .The agent gave all the information about the card process and told will receive callback from Bank end but not received any callback hence cancelled  the plan . I have not faced any difficulties while applying for this credit card .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have been holding CITI bank credit card from long time, they have not charged me annual fee as it is life time free credit card, the credit limit which they have given to me was good, they use to give me good offers on regular basis , so far i did not face any issue.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: AVERAGE
Review: I got an offer so i have applied the card. I have done the documentation process was online. The card limit would be 1L rupees but the card has canceled and i am not shared the reason. The customer support not contacted regarding the card and not good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good in all
Review: Citibank is good overall in the process for the credit card. The customer support and response is fine and there are no hassles to get the card. The limit is fine and there are features and offers which is good. It has been good to bank with them.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: I'm not satisfied with the loan services
Review: CITI bank people called me and said they will be providing a personal loan and i thought that I'm existing customer of CITI bank. After getting all my documents, they said its because of the low credit score, they were unable to process the loan. They have given me a wrong information. The interest rates were different after and before submitting the documents. They did not inform the reason and i followed up with them for last 2 weeks. Initially they were called me and followed me. They had a 13% interest rate and zero processing fee.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Economically best card
Review: If i do call, they cannot attending the call that time, they will arrange a call back to the customer. If I'm having EMIs at one shot, i don't need to go bank and i need to call the customer care. I haven't done any late payment so far. Whatever they have mentioned in the documents regarding the EMI conversion, the same amount they will charge. CITI bank is providing a lots of offers in Swiggy and airline tickets.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent features
Review: For CITI bank, the interest rates are very high. They have a excellent customer care in CITI. Their mobile app and Internet banking is convenient for me to use. There is no charges for the transaction of IMPS and RTGS. We can add the payee immediately and can do a fund transfer.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Better card
Review: In CITI bank, they have not increased the limit whatever i have purchased the card they given me a limit still the same i am using. CITI bank is little bit higher interest rates when i compared with other banks when i convert into EMI. I am holding the card for last 3 years. _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Unhappy
Review: I have selected Citi rewards  credit card  Its is life time. while  document  submitted  through executive. That card got rejected because the income should be 13 lakhs to 15 lakhs .Hence i haven't received credit card from the customer service is not responding.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: There is no specific for choosing the CITI bank credit card but the service is good. I do not get any offers from this card. They have given me a  credit limit of Rs. 65000 and there is a annual fee of Rs. 450 for every single and it will get waived off. I make the payment through online and the EMI conversion facility is there without any charges._x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Deals are good
Review: Citibank has offered me a credit card and the process to get the card was on time. The credit limit is good. There are normal charges for the card annually. The offers are good and the billing statements are on time and it is clear as well. Satisfactory.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good experience
Review: My savings account is with Citibank. The customer support and response is good. They have a very good mobile banking system and it is very convenient to bank with them. There are no charges taken for the transactions I do. It is a hassle free process.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Nice Loan
Review: Not a particular reason for choosing the personal loan from CITI bank. I applied the loan amount of Rs. 50000 and they have provided me a nominal interest rates. Due to the address change issue, the loan got rejected from the bank end. CITI bank service is really good. I have not submitted my documents at all. _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Easy to avail the card
Review: I purchased CITI Bank card before three years, the process was easy for taking the card. They are one who approached me and I got the card within 15 days it has life time free benefits. Their customer support was also helpful and it gave me hassle free experience.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Follow up should be strong
Review: I applied for the Citi bank credit card but at the time I was busy with some work so I am unable to contact them even there was no follow up from the bank end. Reason to chose this card  has shopping and fuel surcharges benefits but unfortunately I could not processed it.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good service
Review: Currently i do not have my current proof where i am staying hence the card got rejected.  In initial state itself, i told them about the address proof and they said they cannot proceed with my available documents. The benefits which i get from the card thats the reason I opted for this card. They had a annual fee of Rs. 3000._x000D_

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Unhappy
Review: I am not satisfied with  Citi bank personal process they were are not responded to my loan application .I have not done with documentation process but they have explained details of the loan. I have been wait for long time finial went other bank to process  with personal loan application.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Need improvement service
Review: I have selected Citi bank personal loan amount is  9 lakhs and rate of  interest 15 percentage and one time processing fee is applicable .while all documents submitted  through executive.Customer service is good and responsive . Due to high rate interest i have disclosed application . They should compare to the Rate of interest in market charger.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good for the frequent riders
Review: I have Indian oil credit card, they have fuel surcharges waiver and reward points facility, I have option to convert the points in to fuel but based on the availability on selected petrol bunks, one points is equal for one rupees. It would be great if they increase their tie up.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Good Experience
Review: CITI bank is really quick in terms of loan process and also I can easily reach the customer support. I believe within 15 minutes they processed the loan application and credited in my account. The service is professional and the interest rate is lower than HDFC.  I took the loan amount of Rs. 2.5 lakhs its good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: EXCELLENT
Review: I am using the card often because they are friendly and intimating due date for repaying the amount. The customer support is 24/7 to help. The credit limit given with the card was good also it is a life time free card. There are having the good cash backs with the card and apart from that no issues.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: GOOD
Review: I am using the loan from last 3 years, it was a pre approval loan where i got the loan instantly on time. There was a processing fee of 1.5% of the total loan amount. The duration for repaying the loan was 4 years. The customer support is good and responsive.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Prompt service should be provided
Review: I had applied the personal loan through online channel, but there was no response for past one months. It was always showing pending with bank, I have submitted the online documents, but there was no response from CITI, finally I dropped the plan. I am very disappointed with their service.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Worst services
Review: I had a bad experience with the CITI bank. Once the documents is collected after that there is no intimation regarding the refusal. After done the verification also its okay. I have applied the loan amount as per my requirements. The provided interest rate is nominal and there is no processing fee. _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Brand card
Review: I donâ??t use the card much compared to previous days. My salary account is in CITI bank hence i have chosen them. They give 10% cashback facility on all other purchases. I got the limit of Rs. 1 approximately and iâ??m happy about it. I have to pay the annual fee of Rs. 1000 and waiver option is there. Its a hassle free card to use.I donâ??t like some of the services. If i want to change my address, i need to visit the branch which is a lengthy process. _x000D_

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Not satisfied

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Average serevice

Title: Personal Loan

Title: Personal Loan

I suggest them not to force the people to take higher amount. I asked for Rs. 3 lakhs hence they quoted 16% therefore I denied to continue.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: AVERAGE

I have received the call and info given to upload documents latter no info given for rejection. The loan got rejected and no info.

Heading: Average

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Experience is good
Review: It has been a excellent experience with  Citibank. I bank with them for a credit card. The customer services are too good. They are responsive as well. The statements are sent to me on time. There are good deals as well. The credit limit is also fine.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have Citi Bank credit card which was taken through Online ,I have received the credit card on time and i have got a clear picture about the card process.The credit limit was good ,The only issue is i have got more amount when i have received my bill bit spend less amount only .This is a chargeable card and this was not informed by the agent._x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have Citi Bank credit card which was taken through agent .I am using this credit card for the past 10 years,I have got all the required details about the card process as well.The credit limit was good and there was no difficulties faced so far .This is a free credit card ,the credit limit was really good and there are good reward points as well .I am comfortable on using this credit card .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: EXCELLENT
Review: The customer support is excellent, the rewards points are good and i have not redeemed the points but the customer support have came forward and helped to redeem the points. The card has the good credit limit also it is a life time free card. There are providing with EMI option for huge amount.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Banking is good
Review: Citibank is good in the credit card deals and the benefits are fine. I cash back offers on fuel. The credit limit is more than satisfactory for me. The customer services and response is good and it is a life time free card. The billing is also clear.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Fine card
Review: I have been getting the good offers from CITI bank. I hold a CITI rewards card for more than 2 years. I never had any issues on this card. I cannot able to convert my rewards points into cash. I called their customer care service and the response is prompt.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: BEST CARD
Review: The documentation process was simple and easy to get the card with CITI BANK. The credit limit given with the card was lesser so expecting for hike with the card also it is a life time free card. There are offers with movie ticket, fuel is there.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Average card
Review: I have been holding CITI bank credit card from long time, they have charged me annual fee in this card but waived off option is available like if i spend certain amount then my fee will get waived off, their service is good, they do not give much offers in this card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD
Review: I have been holding the credit card with the CITI BANK where the card gives the good offers like money back and also the credit limit with this card is satisfactory and it is a life time free card with no annual charges applicable. There is no issues with the billing.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent card

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card

I have received the credit limit of Rs. 90000 and there is no annual charges. I took my credit card loan as well.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent service
Review: I hold an savings account with CITI bank from past twelve years , their service is too good , the best part in this bank is that their service they donâ??t take much time in resolving my queries and there mobile application is not that much good they use to show in hanging mode and till now i did not face any issue i have salary account with this bank and use as saving account as well.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Average card

Heading: Good

Title: Other Loan
Heading: GOOD
Review: I have taken the CITI BANK credit card where the loan amount given with the card was 4L and the rate of interest was 16% which was nominal also the duration for repaying the loan was flexible. It is a pre approval loan also the process of getting the loan was good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Flexible credit card
Review: They are best in the market  interms of service , I am using CITI Indian oil card for last 13 years. First thing they have balance transfer and loan on card through online without contacting the customer support. I donâ??t find such feature in other card like YES bank.

Title: Credit Card

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD

Title: Credit Card

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good for salary holder
Review: CITI is very transparent in all the service, I have been maintain salary account with them hence its convenient. The online banking is very userfriendly, I donâ??t want to visit to the bank. Its my zero balance account, debit card is accessibility is also good._x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: No reason for choosing the CITI bank rewards points. I get 5% cashback on all my purchase. EMI conversion facility is available with the less interest rate. They have charged me a annual fee of Rs. 500 and first bill has come and still due date is there to make the payment.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Charges and limit needs an improvement
Review: I am not satisfied with the credit limit of Citibank credit card. They have only given me a lakh. I have taken the card because it was supposed to be a free card. Later I got to know that I need to spend 50K for the fee of 1K to be waived. The service was good in the process.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good rewards card
Review: When i purchase the card, they have informed me that if i do convert my purchase into EMI, there is no charges for that but CITI is charging 12% as a interest rate. I get joining benefits of 1500 points. I have chosen the CITI rewards card, i don't get any offer in this card. The documentation process was smooth and they pick up the documents from my office.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good for entertainment
Review: I am very much user for hotel, restauranteur, entertainment, this card has cash back offers its really beneficial for me. Per year they are charging  Rs. 500 of annual fee, they do have waiver option. The Citi bank field guy came to my office and gave  me the door step service. _x000D_

Title: Credit Card

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD CARD

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good

Heading: Better

Title: Saving Account

Heading: Good card
Review: I have been using the CITI rewards card for last 4 months, I have not faced any issues so far. Am very much satisfied with the limit provided to me. Its a zero annual fee card. T They have sent me a welcome kit and i have got the joining benefits as well.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have Citi Bank credit card which was taken through Online .There was an issue faced while logging the application the agent called and assisted so customer service was good .I have got the credit card without any delay .This card have good reward points and cash back offers .I am happy with the service .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: AVERAGE
Review: I got the good offer with this CITIBANK cards so i have taken the card. The documentation process was simple and easy. The credit limit is good and it is a payable card for one year. There are miles points with this card and the card is user friendly to access.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Satisfactory
Review: Citi has provided a REWARDS CARD and using it for almost 1.8 years. The customer service is always excellent. I did not convert my payments into EMI so no idea about the charges. I have enabled automatic debit option and never had a chance of late payments. The credit limit is sufficient.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Excellent & Customer friendly
Review: My salary account was maintained in Citi BANK for almost 2.8 years and the customer support is doing a good service. I have not checked the interest rate. I got internet access and am using the mobile app specially for transactions. Its faster to operate and they are sending OTP on time.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Need to decrease charges
Review: I am using CITI bank credit card for more than a month which was applied through an online. I received a card on time and the process was smooth. It is an annual fee chargeable credit card. The credit limit is sufficient to use. The charges are high in this bank.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent
Review: _x000D_I am holding CITI BANK credit card for past two month. Less limit provided from bank end ,while filling in india oil petrol pumps receiving cash back offers.documents submitted through on line .on time received credit limit. i will recommend to my friends.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best Card
Review: Simply i took this CITI platinum card. I have not checked about the rewards points system. The given credit limit was too low actually my expectation was upto Rs. 1 lakhs. They have delivered the card on time. I have not made any transaction so far.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Fantastic card
Review: I have been using Citi Indian Oil Platinum credit card for more than 5 years. The credit limits are sufficient, the best thing is when I swipe my card only in Indian oil petrol bunks on spend of 150=4points=4 rupee which can be used for fuel purpose. It has fuel surcharge waiver off. The annual fee is zero.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Fantastic card
Review: Citi has provided a life time credit card and I hold Citi reward for 5 to 6 years. The credit limits are sufficient for me. When I go for shopping or buy products on Big bazaar and certain outlets for 40K, I get 100 to 150 points. Those points can be redeemed as voucher or on their website. If I accumulate 5000 points on card, 1point=0.30paise so will get 1700 rupees or 1800 rupees on redemption. The customer service is good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Moderate Service
Review: I have Citi Bank credit card which was taken through Online .I have not faced any difficulties ,credit card received  on time ,no special feature not so much ,cashback offers and reward points not checked so far.The credit limit is very less .The agent gave all the details of the card process ,while submitting the  documents no issues faced ,the agent was  very  good and co-operative._x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Service
Review: I choosed this card sometime online shopping 5% discount is there ,This card is an indian oil card and will get  71 litres of fuel which is  free for 1year that is the reason i have choosed the card .The agent not gave all the infomraion about the card process The credit limit is ok  I have not fiound any cash back offers and reward points so far ._x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good
Review: I was selected  Citi bank Indian oil petroleum  credit card and   reward credit limit provide  .while transition iam getting rewards point and cash back offers.on time received credit card.while submitted documents executive has been given correct instruction.1st free year no annual chargers.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Make some clarity to the customer regarding about the paymen
Review: I have some issues in the billing date. After transaction of 50 days of transaction but they have asked me to do the payment after 10 days of transaction. As per the company rules, they are asking me to pay the partial payment other wise. I have converted my purchase into EMI with some additional charges. Customer care people used to listen my query in very patience.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD
Review: I am using the CITIBANK credit card since from last 4-5 years where the card is user friendly and has no issues with this card. There are more cash backs on electronics items while purchasing through the online. The redeem option is easy and can be done through online.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Customer friendly
Review: I am happy with Citi Bank and have been banking with them for last 7months. I did not get any chance to call the customer support but its fine. The rate of interest is standard like other banks. I am using the online services of net banking which is user friendly for doing transactions. Usually I don't ATM services much.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Nice Card
Review: Since i will be traveling much hence i need a lots of fuel and this card very much helpful and CITI bank is a proper company they have their own standards. The CITI people will take care of their customers and they will give a proper response to the customer.  I can use the rewards points to get the fuel.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD
Review: The card with the CITIBANK is good and also the card has the satisfactory credit limit and they have the option of bill payment it is east but for reflection it takes 3 days of time. They offers sometimes with voucher with amazon, the service is good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Satisfactory
Review: I am using Citi Indian Oil Platinum credit card for around 2 years, the points can be utilized for making credit card payment or fuel filling which I like it most. The credit limit is average which they need to improve on. The annual charges are zero. I never contacted the customer service and no idea about the charges.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Better cards
Review: I am using Citi Bank credit card mostly for my transactions. I have 2 cards, one is Indian Oil and other is Rewards card. I can convert the points into fuel, 1point = 1rupee on Indian oil card. They charged me annual fee earlier after placing a request they made as a life time free card. The interest rate is okay but the offers are less.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Average Card
Review: Chosen my CITI bank credit card because of the benefits. There is a annual fee of Rs. 500. I have received the welcome kit and card on time. I'm not sure about the offers provided by them. They have given me a limit of Rs. 60000 and I'm yet to receive my first month bill and i have used the card upto RS. 35000.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Very much excellent
Review: I have taken a credit card loan with Citi Bank. They have provided me a offer of 1.12L, this jumbo loan is very much useful in my critical situation which was very much happy. The interest rate is less and also they have processing fee of 1800 rupees.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Account
Review: I have been using the CITI bank salary account for almost for 1.5 year hence i dont need to maintain the minimum balance. The online banking system is fine. Not even once i have visited their branch. Their customer care service people are very responsive. There are no hidden charges and as per the RBI rules, they are deducting the ATM withdrawals charges.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Good and excellent loan service
Review: My salaried account from CITI hence there is no documentation for applying the personal loan and the interest rates are very low and the process is very quick. The processing fee was nominal and the tenure period which i have chosen for 24 months. I have got the interest rate 13% and its almost within a week they have sanctioned the loan.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Card
Review: They are quick in process and the interest rates are very low compared to others and i hold this card for almost 1.5 years and i will get a everything in online hence nothing like to contact the customer care service. Currently i am using the CITI Indian oil card and i get a 10 rewards points for every Rs. 100 fuel filling and i can able to redeem the rewards points in the same Indian oil petrol bunks.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Not good card
Review: Due to filling the Indian oil petrol i have chosen this card and I am not sure about the rewards points system. I have asked the customer care but they have denied to inform the benefits. There is no annual fee. There is a big problem with the credit limit because they have given only Rs. 50000 as per my salary i can get the limit upto Rs. 2 lakhs. I do not know anything about this card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Better Card
Review: Last 2.5 years since I'm using the CITI bank and there are many offers available on a time to time basis. In the commercial website like Amazon, flipkart i get a cashback offers. CITI bank app is not that much good because very less restricted action can be done and its not delicated.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Excellent Service from Citi Bank
Review: Took a Personal loan from Citi Bank. I liked the responsiveness of their staff, very transparent and value for  customer satisfaction. I have used the Bank Bazaar for both of my loan needs. My experience has been very good. Even their website has been designed nicely and  its very easy to navigate and compare.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have been using Citi bank credit card for long time, their service is excellent , like their service team is doing well and they are providing good offers and discount in general, and i am happy with my credit limit which they have been provided in this card, and they have not charge any annual fee in this card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I am holding CITI BANK  credit card for past few month.  I am getting good   credit limit and i am happy with that. But there is not so much of benefits. Mostly i use this card to pay shopping ,  bills and to buy grocery. So far my experience is good with CITI.Customer service is good . _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best card
Review: My application has been approved with CITI BANK credit card . It is very good experience to have this card i did not have to wait for long time to get the card .  I use this card for shopping , grocery and so many . Offers are many in this card but i have not utilize it . _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have CITI BANK credit card . The time when i got this card, limit was low and i would love if they increase my limit. Don't have Annual Charges on it and its a Free life time Card.I am not aware about rate of interest because yet to use this card . NO hidden charges . _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good service
Review: Previously i have been holding my salary and savings account with CITI bank from past 3 years,  I never had any issues with them. ATM check book are sufficient to carry out all the transactions.  Mobile is easy to use in CITI bank and there are no hidden charges.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: My credit card was taken with CITI BANK . The card is free for the 1st year but it is chargeable  for the next year . No hidden charges are there with this card . Rate of interest is too high here so they can cut down this to com-pit in the market with other cards .  Overall it si good .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best card
Review: I've been using the CITI BANK  credit card for a while. They offered me a very good limit.This is one of the best card i had because this card provide offers in so many places like shopping offer , in ecommerce website there will be so much offers . I am holding this card for 1 month . _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have CITI BANK credit card . Rate of interest is nominal here and and i  receive the card on time there was no delay . The credit limit they offered is very low i need at-lest 300000 . I am not aware about the annul fee i have to check that . Customer service is good till date .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: My credit card was taken with CITI BANK . The credit limit is good but if they provide more then it will be more good . I am not aware about the offers with this card i have to check . Recently i got this card so i haver to use more to give proper feedback .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Card quality is not good without chip unable to swipe
Review: I have CITI BANK Credit card . I am not happy with this card because the card quality is not that and i cannot able to swipe that properly . Offer i am not confirm till date . I cannot comment on customer service because i have not interact with them Rest everything is good .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Average card
Review: I hold CITI BANK credit card . Till date i have not enjoy any offers and i do not feel that there will be any offer with this card . I am not happy with customer service and if i paid i did not get clear statement . There is no hidden charges and i got my card on time .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I am using CITI BANK  credit card for past few years . Rate of interest are reasonable.The card is chargeable but they said if i do transaction of 30000 per annum the fees will be waive off . I have not interact so far with customer service so i cannot give proper feedback . _x000D__x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: My credit card was taken with CITI BANK . I am holding this card for past 1month . Rate of interest is very nominal with this card . I use this card for shopping , traveling and for multipurpose . The statement is very clear and i did not find any hidden charges .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best card
Review: I have been using Citi bank credit card from long time, they have charged me annual fee in this card, but waived off option is available , like if i spend up to 30,000 then my fee will get waived off, i am happy with the credit limit which they have given to me.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good Card
Review: Am holding the CITI bank credit card and the card variant is Rewards card. Recently i have purchased this card and i never spoke with call centre people. Its a life time free credit card. I have no idea about the offers given by this card. I got the second month bill and there is no hidden charges and the bill is very much crisp and clear. _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent card
Review: I have been using CITI bank credit card from long time, they have not charged me annual fee in this card, as it is life time free credit card, the credit limit which they have given to me was good, but it is not secure bank like twice fraudulent activity is done, once for 20,000 and another for 50,000 got deducted but soon got refund, it is not secure bank i could say, their service is good.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good for riders
Review: I always used to put petrol in Indian oil bunks hence I availed this card.  During petrol filling I would be getting some surcharges and points. If I purchase Rs. 30,000 in a year there is no annual fee applicable.  Based on the liters which I put petrol I would be getting cash back on it.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best card
Review: Recently i have applied for CITI REWARDS CARD through on line portal, the reason for choosing this bank card is for their service and offers, they have charged me annual fee in this card, but waiver option is available like if i spend up to 30,000-60,000 then my annual fee will get waived off, the credit limit which they have given to me was good, i use to get good offers in shoppings so my main concern was to take this card as i got good shoppings, the card came on time.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Need to enhance credit limit and want to provide more offers
Review: I am using CITI bank credit card for more than 1 year, the process was done on smooth and I received a card on time. It is a life time free credit card. The credit limit is good to use I would like to suggest to enhance more. As of now I have not received good offers and benefits.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent Service
Review: I have  Citi Bank credit card which was applied through Online .  The credit limit is good and this is a chargeable card not found cash back and reward points,I have received the credit card  on time without any delay ,The agent gave all the information  about the card process .I am satisfied with the service.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent Service
Review: I have not faced any issues  so far on using this Citi Bank cash back credit  card ,I have received the credit card  on time ,The agent gave all the relevant update about the card  ,The credit limit is good ,while submitting documents there was  no issue .this is a free card .i have selected this card  since the offers are good,I have not used cash back offers and reward points so far._x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: GOOD
Review: It is a good bank so i have taken the card with the CITIBANK. The documentation process was simple and easy also i got the card within 3-4 days. The credit limit was lesser so expecting for hike in this card. I have not used the card with this card.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Average Service
Review: I have not faced any difficulties when applied for this credit card  ,The agent gave all information about the card process .I have received the credit card on  on time ,while submitting documents not faced any  issues ,This is a chargeable card ,The credit limit is good and ,the service is average according to  me .

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Best card
Review: Recently applied for CITI bank Indian oil credit card , the reason behind choosing this card is for their reward points like they use to give good reward points in fuels mostly, the credit limit which they have given to me was good, the card came on time.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Everything fine with the card
Review: The interest rates are normal like other cards. Because of i have and car and bike and very usually i will be using the car and filling the fuel hence  i purchased the Indian oil card. There is 4 points is equal to 1 Rs. If i get 3000 to 4000 points which i can redeem in terms of petrol in Indian oil petrol bunk. Once the rewards points accumulated, i can use it in a year. _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: BEST CARD
Review: I am using the CITIBANK credit card where the card has the satisfactory credit limit added on that it is a life time free card wit no annul charges applicable. The customer support is good also there is a option of EMI to paid without any issues through  online.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Need improvement  customer service
Review: I was applied for citi bank credit card. i have not received credit card yet and I drop mail to customer care,but there is no proper response. Hence iam not satisfied citi bank credit card .Need to improvement in citi customer care support._x000D__x000D__x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Okay Card
Review: I have not used the CITI bank credit card much. Initially when i took the credit card, they said there is a annual charges which is Rs. 10000 and if i use the card it will get waived. They have sent a wrong card may be the misunderstanding of a collection executive. _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent service
Review: I have been using Citi bank credit card from recently, they have not charged me annual fee in this card, as it is life time free credit card, the credit limit which they have given to me was good, they have not charged me any hidden charges so far, the card came on time.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I have been using CITI bank credit card from long time, they have charged me annual fee but waived off option available like if i spend up to 30,000 in an year then my annual fee will get waived off, the card came on time, the credit limit which they have given to me was okay, but in future they will increase it would be good, i choose this card to purchase on line shoppings redemption, the petrol they use to waived off.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good service
Review: I have  been using the CITI  BANK  salary account for the  last few years, I never had any issues with them.  ATM check book are sufficient to carry out all the transactions. Overall their baking experience is a recommendable one .  Overall it has been good . _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Good card
Review: I receive my credit on time . They offered good credit limit with this card . Customer support is very helpful . I have CITI BANK credit card .I use to get flight ticket offer . The rate of interest is very reasonable. I am getting good offers  and i am getting good cash back . _x000D_

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Payment gateway should be simpler
Review: I am facing difficulties for making the payment, Citi bank is not showing the bill desk option its automatically re loading to the netbanking . Hence the payment gateway should be simpler but I like the card features are good with nice credit limit.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Nice for regular transaction
Review: I used my CITI Rewards points cards for clothing, petrol filling and food but I didn't notice the cash back or reward points.  But my concern is the credit limit is lesser around Rs. 54,000 but SBI gave me the limit of Rs. 1 lakh, it would be great if they increase the limit.

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Its Satisfactory
Review: I got Indian oil credit card recently from the bank end, I didn't use it. As per my expectation the credit limit is satisfactory, the  process was streamlined I got my card within ten days. The pin generation process was easy, therefore yet to explore the benefits.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: NEED TO IMPROVE THE SERVICE
Review: I am using from last 5 years, it is a salary account so no other extra charges for any of the services provided with the bank. The online banking is not up to the mark should be improved. The customer support is not good but still need to improve the services.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: GOOD
Review: There is a minimum balance of 1000 rupees should be maintained with the BANK OF INDIA. The customer support is good also they are responsive and helpful. I am using the offline banking also there is a limit of transaction of per day of 50K with debit card.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Safe and Secured
Review: Bank of India have very good online service for the PPF account and they have separate staff and counter for the different people like senior citizen. I think they are providing 8% of interest per annum, I can deposit from minimum of Rs. 500 to max upto 1.5 lakh its under tax scheme. I can make partial withdrawal after seven months.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Need scope of imrpovement
Review: There was some issue with the bank interms of printing machine most of time its out of service and shortage of staffs. Bank of India is the one who started first mechanism in Mahalakshmi branch but they need scope of improvement on service and banking atmosphere.

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Its Good
Review: At the time of my durable loan with Bank of India, that  experience was good  now its not upto the mark, I purchased television  through them. I took Rs. 20,000 for the duration of 36 months, they charged 10% of interest but there was no processing fee applicable.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Excellent Experience
Review: I took the housing loan, they gave me 4% of simple interest per annum but its only for the staff. There is no charges application for the housing loan disbursement, I took the loan for the duration of 25 years, they do have balance transfer, part payment and foreclosure without any charges.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Unhappy
Review: I have selected bank of India saving account past 15 year ago using saving account  .customer service is not good, i didn't  receive notification message and email communication from banker end. To be maintain minimum balance Rs 1000. Near to my location ATM is less,

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average service
Review: The mobile banking application and the Internet banking platform are really useful for carrying out all the basic transactions. I have salary  account with   BANK OF INDIA  . I use to get clear statement if i do transaction . Customer service response is very slow with this bank. _x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good service
Review: "_x000D_I hold  BANK OF INDIA  saving  account and it is very secure . It has beautiful features . I use the net banking platform all day to day banking transactions. This is a zero balance account and their banking services are  smooth and hassle free. I am using the account for a daily basis as well."_x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Not satisfied

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good service

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Excellent card
Review: I hold Bank of India credit card from long time, They have not charged me annual fee as it is life time free credit card, the credit limit which they have given to me was sufficient , they have given me as per my requirement, They have not charged any hidden charges.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good account

Review: I have my savings account with Bank Of India from last 6 years, the experience was good so far and i did not face any issues with this bank. The banking services and their facilities are comparatively good than other banks. Customer service is fine and they responded on time. ATM branches are working fine. A minimum balance of Rs 1000 needs to be maintained in this savings account.

Title: Car Loan
Heading: Best service
Review: My car loan experience with Bank of India was very good, the loan amount was for Rs 4.70 lakhs with the rate of interest of 11.9% which is nominal rate of interest. Customer service was very good and there was no delay in their service. The tenure of the loan is 5 years and it was overall a good service from BOI.

Title: Two Wheeler Loan
Heading: Best service
Review: I have taken Two wheeler loan from Bank of India, the loan amount was for Rs 55000 with the rate of interest of 13% which is nominal when compared to other banks. It was a very good loan experience. Customer service was good and i received my loan amount within the given time. They did not charge any processing fees and the tenure of the loan is 3 years.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: Best service
Review: I have taken Personal Loan from Bank of India and the experience was very good. The loan amount was for Rs 2.5 lakhs with the rate of interest of 14.99% which is nominal rate. This was a preapproved loan and the loan amount was disbursed within a day. Customer service was good and they followed up on time. The tenure of the loan is 4 years and it was overall a good service from BOI.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good banking service
Review: It was a very good experience with Bank Of India so far, they provide excellent service when compared to all other nationalized banks. I am very happy with the banking services and the facilities they provide. Customer service is good, they responded on time and there is no delay in the services. I have a daily withdrawal limit of Rs 50000 and the minimum balance of Rs 1000 has to be maintained in this savings account.

Review: I have the savings account with bank of India for past 4 years. The customer support is average with bank of India. The rate of interest and the charges are nominal with Bank of India. I haven't used the net banking with bank of India so far. The banking service need to be improved with bank of India.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Service
Review: My saving account is with Bank of India which was taken  7 years back. They have offered  visa International card and I am getting rewards points also. The daily withdrawal limit was 25,000 and the validity of the card is 2019. The customer service and responses was not satisfactory so they have to improve a lot. My overall experience was good here.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: My Very first saving account
Review: I have this account for almost 11 Years now, and this was my first savings account. It's said the first is the best, I too have that thought. My first account is the best I have. I have been using Netbanking in Bank for the past 5-6 years, long before the netbanking facilities started growing in the country. I have learnt a lot about netbanking after using this Banks Internet Banking which is both convenient and efficient._x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average banking service
Review: I have started using the Bank of India salaried account around 5 years ago. The banking service is average with Bank of India. The customer support is below average with bank of India. I use the net banking is easy to use and customer friendly with bank of India.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Reliable service
Review: I hardly use the account with Bank of India.I mostly use this account for transactions.I have not charged any amount for transaction till date.The customer service and response from their end was good and was satisfying.I directly visit bank to do the transaction.

Title: Saving Account

Title: Saving Account

Title: Saving Account

Title: Saving Account

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average service

Title: Saving Account

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Nationalized bank

I had used this account for 2 months not sure whether this account is in existence or not. Need to visit the bank to check out the status._x000D_

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Convenient Banking
Review: Previously Bank of India was my salary account, I haven't closed it,but still its live now and they are providing better service than SBI.  Their customer service is very good and providing pro active response but they have less account holders.

Title: Personal Loan
Heading: OK OK EXPERIENCE
Review: I am having a ok ok experience with the Bank of India as i took a personal loan from there . Customer service was good the bank provided me the rate of interest of 16% as it was high and also charged me rupees 3500 . I did not had an option so i took the loan from there .

Title: Saving Account
Heading: OK OK EXPERIENCE
Review: Customer service was not that good at all . Not at all a good experience with BANK OF INDIA . The branch service is also not up to the mark as i expected . Its been 19 years and still the bank services are still the same from the first as per my experience

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good Service
Review: I have my one of my savings account with Bank of India. I started this as a student account when I was in college around 8 to 10 years back. Their banking services are good and friendly staffs in the bank so their services are good. It is still a zero balance account.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Satisfactory service
Review: I mostly use the internet banking of Bank of India and the application is pretty good. The services of the bank seems extremely customer oriented.There are no charges for IMPS transactions and it is free of cost. I can recommend this bank to all.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: satisfactory
Review: I hold a salary account with Bank Of India and i would say that it has been a hassle free experience. there has been no requirement of maintaining a minimal balance and the service and response from them is also okay. It has been a satisfactory experience on an overall.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good banking services
Review: I am holding Bank of India savings account from last 5 to 6 years, the banking services provided by BOI is good comparatively. The customer service is good and they responded well. The services are little slow as it is a nationalised bank. I get monthly statements and cheque book on request and on time. The withdrawal limit is less when compared to other banks.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Very good
Review: Bank of India service is very fast and there was no token system in bank. Their bank staff are very cooperative and Serviceable.  Their ATM service is also good it has many options like third party transaction , updating aadhar information, cash withdrawal, other service.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Execellent service
Review: I have a savings account with bank of India since twelve years.Its zero balance account.Bankers respond to the customers without much delay.Net banking is very useful  and time consuming for the customer to perform transactions multiple times.There are so many ATM's located in and around my residence.

Title: Home Loan
Heading: Looking for better service
Review: Bank of India is not corporative to the customer,  previously I took the home loan of Rs.12 lakhs for the tenure of 20 years. They done lot of home loan procedure it was very inconvenience and also they are not customer oriented. Even their interest rate was higher side.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Customer friendly
Review: I started this account very long back, before 25 years I have opened Bank of India. All services are good, like Online service, customer service, phone banking etc. Minimum balance maintenance would be Rs.3000, it gives good saving interest as well.

Title: Saving Account

Title: Saving Account
Heading: SATISFACTORY

Title: Credit Card
Heading: Need to increase the credit limit
Review: I am using the credit service with Bank of India for 1.5 years. My credit limit was Rs.25,000. The annual charges are applicable on this card.The helpline number was provided to reach the customer service. I use domestic credit card and I make the payment online._x000D_

Title: Saving Account

Real slow response towards customer query that should be improved . Its been 7 years I am holding this account and they never provided me anything like offers or anything .

Title: Saving Account

Title: Other Loan
Heading: Good future saving
Review: I have  opened a PPF account, by submitting the form along with KYC documents. PPF account which gives me more interest rate than saving account. It has a locking period 15 years. I could make any amount from 500 to 1 lakh within a year. That interest accumulated in the account.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: People Bank
Review: Being a nationalized bank, service is good in Bank of India. They are very prompt , if some time there was an ATM issue, if my money gets stuck in the machine. Bank of India executives take immediate action and help to credit my money in the account.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Good banking service
Review: Having the savings account with bank of India for past 2 years. The net banking service is good with Bank of India. The customer support is average with bank of India. There is no hassle banking with the bank of India, I would say they are giving a hassle free service.

Title: Saving Account
Heading: Average service
Review: I am not happy with the service of  BANK OF INDIA for my savings account their online banking is not user friendly they need to improve their online service  and also the branch is very far from my location I would say the service of BANK OF INDIA is average.

Title: Car Loan

Review: It was a very convenient process to get the car loan from Bank of India. The customer services are good and there are no hassles. They were on time for the paper work. I got the loan as needed. I am also comfortable with the rate of interest and processing charges.

Title: Credit Card

Review: I have applied for a credit card with Bank of India and the process was very much smooth. There was no much of documentation and the verification was done on time. The services has always been good and the bank is always supportive. There are no hassles.

Title: Saving Account

Review: The services at Bank of India is good. It is a salary account. Though I do not use the internet banking options. I visit the bank to get my banking done. The bank has been responsive when I approached them and they have been beneficial too. There are no charges for the banking services.

Title: Saving Account

Heading: Excellent Service
